Aux niveaux 10 et 18, il peut utiliser ce talent une fois de plus par jour (pour un maximum de 3 utilisations supplémentaires d’un talent de roublard qui s’utilise normalement une seule fois par jour). Les utilisations de ce talent ne doivent pas obligatoirement s’appliquer au même talent de roublard.

Ce talent ne peut pas être utilisé avec un talent de maître roublard.

Multitalented, Greater (UC).name: Talents renouvelés supérieurs (UC)
Multitalented, Greater (UC).description:
Un roublard qui maîtrise ce talent peut utiliser celui de talents renouvelés pour acquérir des utilisations supplémentaires de talents de maître roublard.

Un roublard doit maîtriser talents renouvelés avant de pouvoir sélectionner celui-ci.

Mummification.name: Mummification
Mummification.description:
The alchemist has mastered preserving flesh and applied this knowledge to his own body, turning himself into an undeadlike creature. After learning this discovery, the alchemist must perform a 30-day regimen of a special diet, rigorous exercise, and drinking a mildly poisonous alchemical tea. At the end of this regimen, he falls unconscious for 24 hours, then awakens as a “living mummy.” The alchemist’s type does not change, but he becomes immune to cold, nonlethal damage, paralysis, and sleep.

An alchemist must be at least 10th level and must have the preserve organs discovery before selecting this discovery.

Murder Subdomain.name: Sous-domaine du Meurtre
Murder Subdomain.description:
Domaine associé : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.pEeqEUa2kznrhmzM]{Mort}

Pouvoirs de domaine

D'un simple toucher, le personnage peut faire saigner les créatures vivantes. Il apprécie la compagnie des morts.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.u5LefrXZxQgLqmyJ]{Toucher sanglant}
  • Pouvoir de niveau 8 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.7igyFr0NfuK3k4vq]{Coup de grâce} (remplace Étreinte de la Mort)

Sorts de domaine

  • 1er — @Compendium[pf1.spells.9tww9fc9049h6iqc]{Frayeur}
  • 2e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.k0k8gvqyy3rd5gke]{Mise à mort}
  • 3e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.bbrkkjmgo5kof6gn]{Affûtage} (remplace Animation des morts)
  • 4e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.e0rlki4hwu76l5ya]{Protection contre la mort}
  • 5e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.ggt7q1ds0fvxxjgx]{Suffocation} (remplace Exécution)
  • 6e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.c1e7f0ct04k270wy]{Création de mort-vivant}
  • 7e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.rlfd7f64wgjfvg6e]{Destruction}
  • 8e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.j209j280fyqccq61]{Création de mort-vivant dominant}
  • 9e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.6yeorbvt5ysym3nh]{Suffocation de groupe} (remplace Plainte d’outre-tombe)

Murksight.name: Murksight
Murksight.description:
The witch can see through natural fog, mist, and rain without penalty, ignoring any concealment bonuses gained from such effects. If the effect is created by magic, the witch can see up to 15 feet without penalty, with normal penalties and effects applying beyond that distance.

This ability functions underwater as well, allowing the witch to see in murky water as though it were clear.

This does not allow the witch to see anything she could not see otherwise, such as an invisible creature.

Mutable Flesh.name: Mutable Flesh
Mutable Flesh.description: At 3rd level, once per day when you cast a transmutation spell with a duration of 1 minute per level that affects only you, you can increase its duration to 10 minutes per level. At 9th level, you can increase the duration to 1 hour per level.

Mutagen.name: Mutagènes
Mutagen.description:
Au niveau 1, l’alchimiste découvre comment créer un mutagène qu’il peut boire afin d’améliorer ses prouesses physiques, au prix de sa personnalité. Il lui faut une heure pour préparer une dose de mutagène qui, une fois prête, reste active jusqu’à ce qu’il l’utilise. L’alchimiste ne peut avoir qu’une dose de mutagène de prête à la fois. S’il en prépare une seconde, la première devient inerte. Comme pour les extraits et les bombes, le mutagène devient inerte quand il ne se trouve plus en possession de l’alchimiste et se réactive quand il revient entre ses mains.

Quand un alchimiste prépare un mutagène, il choisit une valeur de caractéristique physique (Force, Dextérité ou Constitution). Boire le mutagène nécessite une action simple. Une fois avalé, le mutagène rend l’alchimiste plus imposant et plus bestial, ce qui lui donne un bonus d’armure naturelle de +2 et un bonus alchimique de +4 à la caractéristique choisie pendant 10 minutes par niveau d’alchimiste. De plus, tant que le mutagène fait effet, l’alchimiste subit un malus de -2 à une valeur de caractéristique mentale. Si le mutagène s’applique à la Force, c’est un malus d’Intelligence, s’il s’applique à la Dextérité c’est un malus de Sagesse et pour la Constitution, c’est un malus de Charisme.

Si quelqu’un boit le mutagène alors qu’il n’est pas alchimiste, il doit réussir un jet de Vigueur (DD 10 +1/2 niveau de l’alchimiste + modificateur d’Intelligence de l’alchimiste) ou être nauséeux pendant 1 heure. Un non-alchimiste ne peut jamais bénéficier des avantages d’un mutagène, mais si un alchimiste boit le mutagène d’un confrère, il profite de ses effets (bien que, si l’autre alchimiste crée un second mutagène, les effets de celui qui a été « volé » disparaissent immédiatement). Les effets des mutagènes ne se cumulent pas et ceux précédemment avalés disparaissent si l’alchimiste en absorbe un autre.

Mutagen (Discovery).name: Mutagen (Discovery)
Mutagen (Discovery).description: This discovery gives the alchemist the mutagen class ability. (This discovery exists so alchemist archetypes who have variant mutagens, such as the mindchemist, can learn how to make standard mutagens.)

Mystery.name: Mystery
Mystery.description:
Each oracle draws upon a divine mystery to grant her spells and powers. This mystery also grants additional class skills and other special abilities. This mystery can represent a devotion to one ideal, prayers to deities that support the concept, or a natural calling to champion a cause. For example, an oracle with the waves mystery might have been born at sea and found a natural calling to worship the gods of the oceans, rivers, and lakes, be they benign or malevolent. Regardless of its source, the mystery manifests in a number of ways as the oracle gains levels. An oracle must pick one mystery upon taking her first level of oracle. Once made, this choice cannot be changed.

At 2nd level, and every two levels thereafter, an oracle learns an additional spell derived from her mystery. These spells are in addition to the number of spells given on Table 2–6. They cannot be exchanged for different spells at higher levels.

Mystic Null.name: Mystic Null
Mystic Null.description:
You gain a +2 insight bonus on saves against spells and spell-like abilities.

At 7th level, this bonus also applies on saves against supernatural abilities.

At 11th level, the bonus increases to +4.

Mystic Veil.name: Mystic Veil
Mystic Veil.description:
Samsaran only.

Samsaran slayers are adept at obscuring the passes of their mountain homes from intruders. The slayer can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.kq916lznxo0ig68v]{Silent Image} as a spell-like ability once per day for every 2 slayer levels he has, using his slayer level as his caster level. The slayer uses his Intelligence modifier on concentration checks when using this ability, and the DC to disbelieve the illusion is equal to 11 + the slayer’s Intelligence modifier.

The slayer must have an Intelligence score of at least 11 to select this talent.

Naga Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Naga Bloodrager Bloodline
Naga Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
The blood of the powerful, serpentine aberrations known as nagas runs through your veins, fueling your bloodrage.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{Alertness}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{Combat Casting}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Power Attack}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{Stealthy}

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{Ray Of Enfeeblement} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{Invisibility} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m84969gni5iu4bdt]{Lightning Bolt} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{Poison} (16th)

Naga Defenses.name: Naga Defenses
Naga Defenses.description:
At 8th level, when entering a bloodrage, you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your natural armor bonus and a +4 bonus on saves against poison.

At 16th level, the bonus to your natural armor increases to +4 and the bonus on saves against poison increases to +8.

At 20th level, the bonus to your natural armor increases to +6, and you gain immunity to poison.

Naga Form.name: Naga Form
Naga Form.description: At 16th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can assume the form of a naga (as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.p8mgf91fcmsi0kdk]{Naga Shape III}).

Naga Thoughts.name: Naga Thoughts
Naga Thoughts.description: At 20th level, when entering a bloodrage, you become immune to charm effects and all forms of mind reading, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against other mind-affecting effects, you gain the effects of the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{See Invisibility}, and you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{Detect Thoughts} at will.

Nails.name: Nails
Nails.description:
The witch's nails are long and sharp, and count as natural weapons that deal 1d3 points of damage (1d2 for a Small witch). These attacks are secondary attacks.

If trimmed, the witch's nails regrow to their normal size in 1d4 days.

Nanite Bloodline.name: Nanite Bloodline
Nanite Bloodline.description:
Your conception was marked by alien influences.

Class Skill(s): Knowledge (engineering).

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{Disguise Self} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.22xn589bmr7ginow]{Defensive Shock} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.frp3ioj2ny5br5ti]{Miasmatic Form} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wuispaydz8jvw3io]{Echolocation} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h4nlrm44ubsyzuhz]{Fluid Form} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.u0qadkpm7dglk6kz]{Magnetic Field}(15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{Iron Body} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{Shapechange} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{Blind-Fight},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{Combat Expertise},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge},
  •  Eldritch Heritage, 
  • Expanded Arcana,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{Improved Disarm},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Knowledge [engineering]).

Bloodline Arcana: Whenever you cast a spell from the transmutation school and target only yourself, increase the spell’s duration by 50%. This does not stack with metamagic feats or abilities such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{Extend Spell}.

Nanite Resurgence.name: Nanite Resurgence
Nanite Resurgence.description:
At 9th level, once per day as an immediate action upon being reduced to one-quarter your maximum hit points, you can force the mechanical swarm living inside you to keep you alive. This ability functions like a @Compendium[pf1.spells.u7y6niex9e7tbhyp]{Resurgent Transformation} spell using your sorcerer level as the caster level, except it is an extraordinary ability and cannot be dispelled.

At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day (though using this ability twice in one 24-hour period entails a chance of system shock and death; see the spell’s description for more details).

At 20th level, you never die of system shock from using this ability.

Nanite Strike.name: Nanite Strike
Nanite Strike.description:
At 1st level as a free action, you can cause nanites to flow from your body and coat the striking end of any manufactured melee weapon you wield. When you hit with a melee attack using this weapon, some of the nanites infect the blood of the victim (Poison—injury; save Fort DC 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Con modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1 Str damage; cure 1 save).

At 5th level, weapons you use with this ability are treated as magical for the purposes of overcoming DR, and the poison also deals 1 point of Constitution damage. At 7th level, the damage increases to 1d2 points of Constitution damage and 1d2 points of Strength damage. At 11th level, the cure becomes two successful saves.

You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier; these rounds need not be consecutive.

Nanite Surge.name: Nanite Surge
Nanite Surge.description:
At 3rd level, once per day as an immediate action, you can cause your nanites to surge, granting you a bonus equal to 3 + your sorcerer level on any one d20 roll; this ability must be activated before the roll is made. If you already possess the nanite surge ability from another source (such as from being an android), you can use your nanite surge an additional time per day.

At 9th level, you can use this ability an additional time per day.

Natural Disaster.name: Natural Disaster
Natural Disaster.description:
A witch using this hex calls down the forces of nature to wreak havoc on an area. This functions as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{Storm Of Vengeance} combined with an @Compendium[pf1.spells.a5gcbpwfhu4hh5ic]{Earthquake} that occurs on the second round of the effect (while acid is raining from the sky). A witch must concentrate for the duration of this effect. If disrupted, the effect immediately ends.

A witch can only use this ability once per day.

Natural Divination.name: Natural Divination
Natural Divination.description:
You can read the entrails of a freshly killed animal or humanoid to gain an insight bonus equal to your Charisma modifier on one saving throw. Alternatively, by observing and interpreting the flights of birds, you may apply a +10 competence bonus on any one skill check. Finally, by charting marks in dirt or stone, or observing the behavior of sand when thrown into the wind, you gain a +4 insight bonus on one initiative check. These bonuses must be used during the next 24 hours and you must declare you are using the bonus before the check or save is made. Making a natural divination takes 10 minutes.

You may use natural divination (in any combination) once per day plus one additional time per day for every four oracle levels you have attained.

Natural Spell Combat.name: Combat magique naturel
Natural Spell Combat.description: Le magus peut utiliser son combat magique avec une arme naturelle de son choix. Lorsqu'il le fait, il gagne un bonus de +2 à ses tests de concentration. S'il effectue cette attaque avec un bras ou un appendice qui pourrait manier une arme, il ne peut pas manier d'arme avec l'appendice ou le bras. Sinon, il peut effectuer cette attaque en plus de toutes les autres attaques possibles pendant le combat magique. Cet arcane peut être choisi plusieurs fois et concerne à chaque fois une attaque naturelle différente mais le bonus aux tests de concentration ne se cumule pas.

Nature Bond.name: Pacte avec la nature
Nature Bond.description:
Au niveau 1, un lien se crée entre le druide et la nature, lien qui peut prendre une des deux formes suivantes.

Domaine de druide

Dans la première forme, le druide devient si intime avec la nature qu’il acquiert l’un des @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.zrUJt7YpAJkf2NC6]{domaines} de prêtre suivants : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.flMrvQOBVwXagqow]{Air}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.qCSvyJt8O7tNF5QC]{Climat}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.mtDcvNtXAwM66T9v]{Eau}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Io7oIAjPo9rRbvDS]{Faune}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.KbcnBk7n4tctvnI9]{Feu}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Zi8PhdwJRQfN71AD]{Flore} ou @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.IXqYkTnaEgHG2ui3]{Terre}. Pour toutes les capacités et les sorts en bonus donnés par ce domaine, on considère que le niveau de prêtre du personnage est égal à son niveau de druide. Comme les prêtres, les druides qui choisissent cette option reçoivent des emplacements de sorts de domaine qu’ils ne peuvent utiliser que pour préparer les sorts de leur domaine et qu’ils ne peuvent pas employer pour une @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.utbMg45UlQKSuak9]{incantation spontanée}.

Domaines animaux et environnementaux. En plus de ces domaines communs avec les prêtres, un druide peut choisir un domaine animal ou environnemental au lieu de l’un des domaines précité.

Tout comme les domaines de prêtre, ceux du druide lui donnent des pouvoirs et des sorts de domaine. Un druide qui choisit un domaine animal ou environnemental gagne un emplacement de sort de domaine par niveau.

Un druide qui vénère un dieu (et non la nature en général) ne peut pas choisir un domaine animal ou environnemental qui entre en contradiction avec les thèmes associés à sa divinité ou qui sort de sa juridiction.

Si un pouvoir de domaine animal ou environnement autorise un jet de sauvegarde, le DD du jet est égal à 10 + 1/2 du niveau du druide + modificateur de Sagesse.

Les autres classes basées sur la nature qui donnent accès à des domaines peuvent choisir un domaine animal ou environnemental au lieu d’un domaine ordinaire.

Compagnon animal

La seconde forme consiste en un lien étroit entre le druide et un compagnon animal ou vermine. Le druide peut commencer sa carrière en étant accompagné d’un des animaux ou une des vermines cités dans la liste des compagnons animaux et vermines. Le compagnon est loyal et accompagne le druide lors de ses aventures.

Contrairement aux animaux normaux, le compagnon animal ou vermine évolue (en dés de vie, en caractéristiques, en compétences et en dons) lorsque le druide gagne des niveaux. Si le personnage possède plusieurs classes offrant un compagnon animal, ses niveaux dans ces différentes classes se cumulent pour déterminer les caractéristiques de son compagnon. La taille de la plupart des compagnons animaux s’accroît lorsque le druide atteint le niveau 4 ou 7 (selon le compagnon). Si le druide décide de se séparer de son compagnon, il peut en obtenir un autre en accomplissant un rituel qui nécessite vingt-quatre heures de prières ininterrompues au sein d’un environnement de vie typique pour le nouveau compagnon animal. Cette cérémonie peut également être utilisée pour remplacer un compagnon animal qui est mort.

Nature Final Revelation.name: Nature Final Revelation
Nature Final Revelation.description: At 20th level, you have discovered the intrinsic secrets of life itself, granting you incredible control over your own body. Once per day, you can surround yourself with an organic cocoon as a full-round action. While enclosed in the cocoon, you are considered helpless. Eight hours later, you emerge having changed your type to plant, animal, or humanoid, gaining superficial physical characteristics as appropriate (see the Pathfinder RPG Bestiary). This change does not alter your Hit Dice, hit points, saving throws, skill points, class skills, or proficiencies. Each time the transformation is made, you are cleansed of all poisons or diseases, are restored to full hit points, and heal all ability damage. You must select a new type every time the transformation is made.

Nature Mystery.name: Nature Mystery
Nature Mystery.description:
Class Skills: An oracle with the nature mystery adds Climb, Fly, Knowledge (nature), Ride, Survival, and Swim to her list of class skills.

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{Charm Animal} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.la7kuehewu85ybnt]{Barkskin} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rrsefzpm3nhztvld]{Speak with Plants} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0sssdtv0tkbns2r3]{Grove of Respite} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h9qiwo9kx8d1hqrn]{Awaken} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wgm8mm1za909pwch]{Stone Tell} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{Creeping Doom} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{Animal Shapes} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.refg1teqkrdtxllg]{World Wave} (18th).

Nature Sense.name: Instinct naturel
Nature Sense.description: Le druide bénéficie d’un bonus de +2 aux tests de Connaissances (nature) et de Survie.

Nature Spirit.name: Esprit de la Nature
Nature Spirit.description:
Un chaman qui choisit l’esprit de la nature revêt une apparence reflétant le monde naturel duquel il se sent le plus proche. Un chaman de la nature proche de la forêt a la peau et les cheveux teintés de vert, avec des yeux émeraude tandis qu’une odeur de verdure et de fleurs flotte autour de lui. Un chaman de la nature vivant dans la toundra sera d’une blancheur d’albâtre, avec des cheveux de platine et des yeux d’un bleu cristallin, sa peau étant toujours d’une froideur surprenante.

Sorts de magie des esprits : 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{Charme-animal} (1er), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.la7kuehewu85ybnt]{Peau d’écorce} (2ème), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rrsefzpm3nhztvld]{Communication avec les plantes} (3ème), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0sssdtv0tkbns2r3]{Bosquet reposant} (4ème), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h9qiwo9kx8d1hqrn]{Éveil} (5ème), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wgm8mm1za909pwch]{Pierres commères} (6ème), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{Mort rampante} (7ème), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{Métamorphose animale} (8ème), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.refg1teqkrdtxllg]{Vague mondiale} (9ème)

Esprit animal : L’esprit animal du chaman a l’air féroce et semble au summum de sa condition physique. Il se déplace dans les taillis et sur les terrains difficiles naturels au maximum de sa vitesse de déplacement sans subir de dégâts ni essuyer le moindre inconvénient. S’il a une vitesse de vol, il ignore les malus liés au vent tant qu’il ne souffle pas en tempête.

Nature Spirit Manifestation.name: Manifestation de l’esprit de la nature
Nature Spirit Manifestation.description:
En atteignant le niveau 20, le chaman devient un esprit de la nature. Une fois par jour, il peut s’entourer d’un cocon de soie par une action complexe. Une fois dans le cocon, il est considéré comme sans défense. Huit heures plus tard, il en ressort en ayant changé son type pour devenir plante, animal ou humanoïde. Il adopte les caractéristiques physiques superficielles du type choisi. Il doit choisir un type différent de celui qu’il possède actuellement. Cet effet ne modifie pas ses Dés de Vie, ses points de vie, ses jets de sauvegarde, ses rangs de compétence, ses aptitudes de classe ni sa formation au maniement des armes et au port des armures.

À chaque fois que le chaman se transforme ainsi, il est purifié des poisons et des maladies, il récupère la totalité de ses points de vie et il guérit de tous ses affaiblissements temporaires de caractéristique.

Nature Training.name: Nature Training
Nature Training.description: A hunter counts her total hunter level as both druid levels and ranger levels for the purpose of qualifying for feats, traits, and options that modify or improve an animal companion.

Nature's Gifts.name: Nature's Gifts
Nature's Gifts.description: Once per day, the shaman can command trees and other plants to yield magical berries and fruit. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.k4whhwm1dsz2upkm]{Goodberry}, except the maximum number of hit points it can restore to a subject in a 24-hour period from this hex is equal to the shaman’s Charisma modifier (minimum 1 hit point per day).

Nature's Thorns.name: Nature's Thorns
Nature's Thorns.description: At 16th level, creatures that hit you in melee (other than those using manufactured reach weapons) take 4d6 points of piercing damage. A creature takes this damage only on its first successful attack against you in a combat round, and not on subsequent attacks in that round.

Nature's Whispers.name: Nature's Whispers
Nature's Whispers.description: You have become so attuned to the whispers of the natural world, from the croaking of frogs to the groaning of great boulders, that your surroundings constantly keep you preternaturally aware of danger. You may add your Charisma modifier, instead of your Dexterity modifier, to your Armor Class and CMD. Any condition that would cause you to lose your Dexterity modifier to your Armor Class instead causes you to lose your Charisma modifier to your Armor Class.

Nauseating Flesh.name: Nauseating Flesh
Nauseating Flesh.description: The alchemist’s body is suffused with poison. Any creature that bites, engulfs, or swallows the alchemist must make a Fortitude saving throw or be nauseated for 1d4 rounds. An alchemist must be at least 12th level before selecting this discovery. The alchemist with this discovery does not suffer the effect of the poison of his own nauseating flesh.

Near Death.name: Near Death
Near Death.description:
You gain a +2 insight bonus on saves against diseases, mind-affecting effects, and poisons.

At 7th level, this bonus also applies on saves against death effects, sleep effects, and stunning.

At 11th level, the bonus increases to +4.

Necromancy Resonant School.name: Instruments de nécromancie
Necromancy Resonant School.description:
Les instruments qui puisent leur pouvoir des énergies nécromantiques peuvent contrôler les morts-vivants et nuire aux vivants.

Instruments : Crâne, os, pièce de monnaie, poupée, robe, tambour.

Necromancy School.name: École de Nécromancie
Necromancy School.description:
Pouvoirs d'école

Les nécromanciens sont des magiciens terrifiants et souvent craints qui commandent aux morts-vivants et utilisent les sombres pouvoirs de la non-vie contre leurs ennemis.

  • Pouvoir passif : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.jI66IOBVloeSyeGz]{Emprise sur les morts-vivants}
  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.1XDvZLP9UPjr1glZ]{Toucher du tombeau}
  • Pouvoir de niveau 8 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.5JrtpLs5AJZ5NI40]{Perception de la vie}

 

Champs d'étude magiques

  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.abjlF9XM3j72rzua]{Morts-vivants}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.hN7nfIgDvGMd2MZf]{Vie}

Necromantic Focus.name: Necromantic Focus
Necromantic Focus.description: The implement grants its possessor greater power over the undead. Whoever possesses the implement can control an additional 2 Hit Dice of undead for every point of mental focus invested in the item (to a maximum number of Hit Dice equal to 4 × your occultist level). Any spellcaster who bears the implement can add it as an additional focus component for a necromancy spell he casts to create undead. If he does so, he can create an additional number of HD of undead equal to the additional HD the implement allows him to control (apply this effect after doubling the HD of undead for desecrate, if applicable). Undead creatures take a –1 penalty on saving throws against spells cast by the bearer of this implement for every 4 points of mental focus invested in this implement.

Necromantic Servant.name: Necromantic Servant
Necromantic Servant.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to raise a single human skeleton (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 250) or human zombie (Bestiary 288) from the ground to serve you for 10 minutes per occultist level you possess or until it is destroyed, whichever comes first. This servant has a number of hit points equal to 1/2 your maximum hit point total (not adjusted for temporary hit points or other temporary increases). It also uses your base attack bonus and gains a bonus on damage rolls equal to 1/2 your occultist level.

At 5th level, whenever the necromantic servant would be destroyed, if you are within medium range (100 feet + 10 feet per level) of the servant, you can expend 1 point of mental focus as an immediate action to cause the servant to return to full hit points.

At 9th level, you can choose to give the servant the bloody or burning simple template (if it’s a skeleton) or the fast simple template (if it’s a zombie).

At 13th level, when you take an immediate action to restore your servant, it splits into two servants. You can have a maximum number of servants in existence equal to 1/2 your occultist level.

At 17th level, the servant gains a teamwork feat of your choice.

Neutralizing Bomb.name: Neutralizing Bomb
Neutralizing Bomb.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to give it the potential to end certain ongoing effects instead of dealing damage. Each creature in the splash radius can attempt a new saving throw against any poison afflicting it and any ongoing conditions or ongoing acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. (If an effect did not allow a saving throw, this bomb doesn’t allow affected creatures to attempt one.) Success counts as one successful save toward ending poison and immediately ends other conditions. Exposed poison in the splash radius is also rendered harmless. A creature with poison abilities that is directly struck by the bomb finds those abilities useless for 1d4 rounds unless it succeeds at a Fortitude saving throw.

This discovery doesn’t stack with any other that modifies bombs.

New Arcana.name: Nouveaux arcanes (L. Profane)
New Arcana.description:
Au niveau 9, le personnage peut ajouter à son répertoire un sort provenant la liste des sorts d’ensorceleur et de magicien. Le sort choisi doit appartenir à un niveau de sort auquel l’ensorceleur a accès. Il peut ajouter à nouveau un sort supplémentaire aux niveaux 13 et 17.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Y926YHNobEojovx4]{Lignage Profane}.

Nidalese Shadow Veil.name: Nidalese Shadow Veil
Nidalese Shadow Veil.description: By expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir, an arcanist can pull a veil of shadows around her, making her more difficult to spot and strike. The arcanist gains concealment (20% miss chance) and a +5 bonus on Stealth checks. This effect lasts a number of rounds equal to 1 + the arcanist’s Charisma bonus.

Night Hunter.name: Chasseur nocturne
Night Hunter.description: Par une action simple, le prêtre peut se fondre dans les ombres de la nuit et devenir pratiquement invisible. Tant qu’il demeure dans une zone sombre ou faiblement éclairée, il est invisible (comme le sort du même nom) aux créatures qui ne possèdent pas la vision dans le noir, et ce pendant un nombre de rounds égal à la moitié de son niveau de prêtre (minimum 1). Il peut utiliser cette capacité un nombre de fois par jour égal à 3 + son modificateur de Sagesse.

Night Subdomain.name: Sous-domaine de la Nuit
Night Subdomain.description:
Domaine associé : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.LbTp3TdtQ2S7wtvG]{Obscurité}

Pouvoirs de domaine

Le personnage peut manipuler les ombres et les ténèbres. Il reçoit également @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{Combat en aveugle} comme don supplémentaire.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.sOXc6XpR4j7lA2rr]{Chasseur nocturne} (remplace Toucher des ténèbres)
  • Pouvoir de niveau 8 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.M8IQnVMYyqh1Mrl7]{Vision dans l’obscurité}

Sorts de domaine

  • 1er — @Compendium[pf1.spells.3plb67e51webutdz]{Sommeil} (remplace Brume de dissimulation)
  • 2e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.k7cf5gshkp8xxqux]{Cécité}
  • 3e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{Ténèbres profondes}
  • 4e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{Convocation d’ombres}
  • 5e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{Convocation de monstres V} ([[/r 1d3]] ombres seulement)
  • 6e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{Cauchemar} (remplace Traversée des ombres)
  • 7e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.gado7zyg5knc83ir]{Mot de pouvoir aveuglant}
  • 8e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.967ur7a9xepd704y]{Convocation d’ombres suprême}
  • 9e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.xxaycxbdsmalf5ov]{Reflets d’ombre}

Night Terror.name: Night Terror
Night Terror.description:
You send your spirit to torment another being’s dreams. Once per day, you may target a creature with the effects of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{Nightmare} spell. Instead of the spell’s normal damage, you make a full attack, using your Charisma modifier in place of your Strength modifier, against the victim’s touch AC. You deal 1d10 damage for each successful hit.

You must be at least 11th level before selecting this revelation.

Night Vision.name: Vision dans le noir (Rage)
Night Vision.description:
Prérequis : pouvoir de rage @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.aHKWBD3TIHGDZWV5]{Vision dans la nuit} ou trait racial vision nocturne

Lorsque le barbare est en rage, ses sens deviennent incroyablement aiguisés et il bénéficie des effets de la vision dans le noir sur une distance de 18 m (12 cases).

Night Vision (UC).name: Vision de nuit (RageU)
Night Vision (UC).description:
Prérequis : pouvoir de rage @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.jJ0PUmdqhJ8kZzdB]{Vision nocturne} ou trait racial vision nocturne

Les sens extrêmement aiguisés du barbare en rage lui confèrent la vision dans le noir jusqu’à 18 mètres. S’il est déjà capable de voir dans le noir, la portée de la vision augmente de 18 mètres.

Nightblindness (Stare).name: Nightblindness (Stare)
Nightblindness (Stare).description: The darkvision range of the hypnotic stare’s target decreases by 10 feet.

Nighteye.name: Œil de la nuit (L. Ombres)
Nighteye.description:
Au niveau 3, l’ensorceleur gagne une vision dans le noir à 9 m (6 c). Au niveau 9, celle-ci s’étend à 18 m (12 c). S’il est déjà capable de voir dans le noir, les distances citées ci-dessus s’ajoutent à la portée de sa vision dans le noir.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.MG4wDFbCBIx69iNW]{Lignage des Ombres}.

Nightmare (Stare).name: Nightmare (Stare)
Nightmare (Stare).description: The target of the hypnotic stare rolls twice on all Will saves versus fear, taking the lower result.

Nightmares.name: Nightmares
Nightmares.description: Calling upon fell powers, a witch can place a hex on a creature within 60 feet that causes its sleep to be tormented by terrible nightmares. This functions as the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{Nightmare} each time the affected creature attempts to rest. A Will save negates this effect. If the save is failed, the target must make a new save each night or be unable to rest.

Nightmares Patron.name: Nightmares Patron
Nightmares Patron.description:
• 2nd — @Compendium[pf1.spells.3plb67e51webutdz]{Sleep}
  • 4th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{Detect Thoughts}
  • 6th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.j7mhkhixnvd0amye]{Oneiric Horror}
  • 8th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{Phantasmal Killer}
  • 10th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{Nightmare}
  • 12th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.laz5zb1cdfb9jzit]{Dream Travel}
  • 14th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.ylewzn5nlzy7ugdm]{Symbol Of Weakness}
  • 16th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.21r9ptvsjo99o3yw]{Demand}
  • 18th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight}

Nightmate Subdomain.name: Sous-domaine des Cauchemars
Nightmate Subdomain.description:
Domaine associé : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.jb0WCVxSOi5e8gEE]{Folie}

Pouvoirs de domaine

Le personnage a laissé libre cours à la folie qui couvait en son sein et il peut la libérer pour déstabiliser ses ennemis ou sacrifier certaines capacités pour en améliorer d’autres.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.q68c1enBp2oR7eUe]{Toucher terrible} (remplace Vision de folie)
  • Pouvoir de niveau 8 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Aw4xfA8YSYHGiUXV]{Aura de folie}

Sorts de domaine

  • 1er — @Compendium[pf1.spells.ud4xukzhan89qhm4]{Confusion mineure}
  • 2e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.648x72rflah0ggyz]{Idiotie}
  • 3e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{Rage}
  • 4e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{Assassin imaginaire} (remplace Confusion)
  • 5e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{Cauchemar}
  • 6e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.pzwe3gxjz8gthyaj]{Manteau de rêves} (remplace Assassin imaginaire)
  • 7e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{Aliénation mentale}
  • 8e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.34jyuvdflia4goib]{Motif scintillant}
  • 9e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.3wdx7fjulsohi1lk]{Ennemi subconscient}

Nimble.name: Nimble
Nimble.description: Starting at 2nd level, a gunslinger gains a +1 dodge bonus to AC while wearing light or no armor. Anything that causes the gunslinger to lose her Dexterity bonus to AC also causes the gunslinger to lose this dodge bonus. This bonus increases by +1 for every four levels beyond 2nd level (to a maximum of +5 at 20th level).

Nimble (SWA).name: Nimble (SWA)
Nimble (SWA).description:
At 3rd level, a swashbuckler gains a +1 dodge bonus to AC while wearing light or no armor. Anything that causes the swashbuckler to lose her Dexterity bonus to AC also causes her to lose this dodge bonus.

This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels beyond 3rd (to a maximum of +5 at 19th level).

Nimble Climber.name: Grimpeur félin
Nimble Climber.description: L’homme-félin roublard ayant ce talent gagne un bonus de +4 à ses tests d’Escalade. S’il possède le trait racial grimpeur, il peut faire 10 à ses tests d’Escalade, même lorsqu’il est en danger immédiat ou distrait.

Nimble Climber (UC).name: Grimpeur félin (UC)
Nimble Climber (UC).description: Chaque fois que le roublard échoue à un test d'escalade de 5 ou plus, il peut tenter un jet de sauvegarde de Réflexes (en utilisant le même DD que le test d'Escalade) pour se rattraper et éviter de tomber.

Nimble Walker.name: Marcheur agile (L. Kobold)
Nimble Walker.description:
Au niveau 20, le kobold gagne un bonus racial de +5 à ses jets de Réflexes et à ses tests d’Acrobaties pour traverser la zone que menace ou qu’occupe une créature. Il gagne aussi la capacité à respirer lorsqu’il se déplace dans la terre grâce à sa capacité @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.qL46iuYaKstSaQv4]{nage dans la terre}.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.9hNyAsFvgNzv0zGT]{Lignage Kobold}.

Nimbus of Light.name: Halo Lumineux
Nimbus of Light.description: Au niveau 8, le personnage peut activer un halo de lumière de 9 m de rayon chaque jour pendant un nombre total de rounds égal à son niveau de prêtre. Ce halo a le même effet qu’un sort de @Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{Lumière du jour}. De plus, chaque round, les morts-vivants situés dans la zone d’effet du halo subissent 1 point de dégât par niveau de prêtre du personnage. Les sorts et les pouvoirs magiques du registre de l’obscurité sont automatiquement dissipés lorsqu’ils entrent en contact avec le halo. Ces rounds ne doivent pas forcément être consécutifs.

Nine-Tailed Kineticist.name: Nine-Tailed Kineticist
Nine-Tailed Kineticist.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0
Prerequisite kitsune

You can cast a spell-like ability granted to you by any Magical Tail feat you have by accepting 1 point of burn, even if you have no daily uses of that spell-like ability remaining. You must be able to use wild talents of a level equal to the number of extra tails required to use a spell-like ability granted by a Magic Tail feat to use this ability to cast that spell-like ability (for example, you would need to be 15th level and able to use 8th-level wild talents to use this talent to cast the dominate person spell-like ability granted by Magical Tail).

In addition, you can learn a Magical Tail feat that you qualify for in place of gaining a new infusion or utility wild talent.

Ninja Trick.name: Attaque distrayante
Ninja Trick.description: Un roublard qui prend ce talent peut choisir une astuce de ninja. Le roublard ne peut pas choisir une astuce de ninja qui porte le même nom qu’un talent de roublard. Il peut choisir une astuce qui demande des points de ki mais ne pourra pas l’utiliser à moins de posséder le talent réserve de ki. Un roublard peut choisir ce talent à plusieurs reprises.

No Breath.name: No Breath
No Breath.description:
Element void; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn —
Prerequisite emptiness

You gain no breath, as per the universal monster ability, and you can survive in the vacuum of space.

No Breath (4 pts).name: No Breath (4 pts)
No Breath (4 pts).description:
An eidolon no longer needs to breathe. The eidolon does not breathe, and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as inhaled poison). This does not give immunity to cloud or gas attacks that do not require breathing.

The summoner must be at least 11th level before selecting this evolution.

No Escape.name: Poursuite (Rage)
No Escape.description: Lorsqu’un adversaire situé à côté du barbare en rage entreprend une retraite pour s’en éloigner, le barbare peut se déplacer du double de sa vitesse de déplacement normale par une action immédiate. Il doit alors terminer son mouvement à côté de l’ennemi qui a battu en retraite. Le déplacement du barbare est sujet aux attaques d’opportunité normalement. Ce pouvoir ne peut être utilisé qu’une seule fois par rage.

No Escape (UC).name: Poursuite (RageU)
No Escape (UC).description: Le barbare peut parcourir jusqu’au double de sa vitesse de déplacement par une action immédiate. Il peut utiliser ce pouvoir uniquement quand un adversaire adjacent effectue une action de repli pour s’éloigner de lui. Son déplacement doit se terminer sur un emplacement adjacent à l’ennemi qui a effectué l’action de repli. Le barbare provoque des attaques d’opportunité comme à l’accoutumée pendant ce déplacement supplémentaire.

No Place Like Home.name: No Place Like Home
No Place Like Home.description:
The witch fills an ally with the safety he feels at home or inflicts pangs of homesickness to hamper an enemy’s defenses. She chooses a target for the hex within 30 feet. If she chooses an ally, that ally gains a +2 dodge bonus to AC against traps and on Reflex saves against traps. If she chooses an opponent, that opponent takes a –2 penalty to AC against traps and on Reflex saves against traps. Either way, the effects last for 1 minute. The target can attempt a Will save to negate the effects of the hex.

At 8th level, the bonus or penalty increases to 4.

At 16th level, the bonus or penalty increases to 6.

A creature targeted by this hex cannot be targeted again by this hex for 1 day.

No Trace.name: No Trace
No Trace.description: At 3rd level, a ninja learns to cover her tracks, remain hidden, and conceal her presence. The DC to track a ninja using the Survival skill increases by +1. In addition, her training gives her a +1 insight bonus on Disguise skill checks and on opposed Stealth checks whenever she is stationary and does not take any action for at least 1 round. Every three levels thereafter, the increase to Survival DCs and the bonuses on Disguise and opposed Stealth checks increase by 1.

Nobility Blessing: Inspiring Ward.name: Nobility Blessing: Inspiring Ward
Nobility Blessing: Inspiring Ward.description: At 1st level, you can speak a few words to a creature within 30 feet that fill them with inspiration. You can grant that creature a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, ability checks, skill checks, or saving throws (your choice). This effect lasts for 1 minute.

Nobility Blessing: Lead by Example.name: Nobility Blessing: Lead by Example
Nobility Blessing: Lead by Example.description: At 10th level, as a swift action you can inspire your allies to follow your lead. If the following action on your turn is an attack or skill check, all allies within 30 feet who take the same action against the same foe or obstacle on their next turn gain a +4 morale bonus on that roll.

Nobility Domain.name: Domaine de la Noblesse
Nobility Domain.description:
Pouvoirs de domaine

Le personnage est un grand chef qui inspire tous ceux qui suivent les enseignements de sa foi.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.8hVa9HwekAWpgHid]{Parole inspirante}
  • Pouvoir de niveau 8 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.hd6MiVc69RyEuDpU]{Prestige}

Sorts de domaine

  • 1er — @Compendium[pf1.spells.21bxbzdaawjrnvyo]{Faveur divine}
  • 2e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.v3d3lnjj7ks0ztii]{Discours captivant}
  • 3e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{Panoplie magique}
  • 4e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.9vdjohbrj896e2ot]{Détection du mensonge}
  • 5e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.l1zl69j95ad7l9dn]{Injonction suprême}
  • 6e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.pfv5zv744x9dwg38]{Quête}
  • 7e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.5w1zrztwbvd6xkgj]{Champ de force}
  • 8e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.21r9ptvsjo99o3yw]{Exigence}
  • 9e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{Tempête vengeresse}

 

Sous-domaines

  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.j4uzXCLo91dJszhU]{Aristocratie}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Nc629yyeBE0UeG2n]{Commandement}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Rfib6GcSF86xCZZu]{Martyre}

Noble Visage.name: Visage Noble
Noble Visage.description: Le personnage gagne un bonus de +1 aux tests de Charisme et aux tests de compétence dépendant du Charisme envers les créatures partageant son type de créature, ou sous-type s'il est humanoïde. Ce bonus augmente de +1 tous les 5 niveaux qu'il possède. Par une action simple de contact, il peut en faire bénéficier une créature partageant son type de créature pendant une minute. Il perd alors l'effet du noble visage pendant une minute. Chaque jour, le personnage peut utiliser ce pouvoir un nombre de fois égal à 3 + son modificateur de Sagesse.

Nooks and Crannies.name: Nooks and Crannies
Nooks and Crannies.description: You can move through any sort of obstacle or difficult terrain in an urban environment (including crowds) at your normal speed and without taking damage or suffering any other impairment. Areas that are enchanted or magically manipulated to impede motion still affect you.

Nostrum.name: Nostrum
Nostrum.description:
When the alchemist creates an infusion, he can mask a delayed poison within the mixture. A nostrum can contain only an ingested poison, and the save DC of the poison is reduced by 2. The poison takes effect a number of hours after being imbibed equal to the alchemist’s Intelligence bonus (minimum 0) decided by the alchemist at the creation of the nostrum. The poison within a nostrum can be detected as normal by spells such as detect poison and similar abilities. Until the nostrum is consumed or destroyed, it continues to occupy one of the alchemist’s daily extract slots.

An alchemist must have the infusion discovery before selecting this discovery.

Nothing Can Stop Me.name: Rien ne m’arrête
Nothing Can Stop Me.description:
Une fois par round, lorsque le justicier se déplace, il peut effectuer une attaque par une action libre contre un objet non tenu qui se trouve sur son chemin, comme une porte ou une table. Si son attaque inflige suffisamment de dégâts pour détruire l’objet, il peut continuer son mouvement, s’il ne le détruit pas, il s’arrête. Cette attaque est considérée comme faisant partie de son action de mouvement et n’est pas décompté de son nombres d’attaque maximale par round. Si son attaque vise une créature cachée (comme une mimique), elle rate automatiquement et le mouvement du justicier s’arrête (même s’il peut attaquer la créature normalement après son mouvement).

Seul un justicier vengeur peut choisir ce talent.

Notorious Fool.name: Notorious Fool
Notorious Fool.description:
While in his social identity, the vigilante can feign absentmindedness, clumsiness, drunkenness, or eccentricity very convincingly. When he fails an opposed Sleight of Hand or Stealth check while in his social identity, he can immediately attempt a Bluff check opposed by the onlookers’ Sense Motive checks to appear as though he had only blundered or stumbled in a spectacular fashion. If he succeeds at this Bluff check, the onlookers do not realize the vigilante was attempting the action that prompted him to attempt a Sleight of Hand or Stealth check, although being in the wrong place or behaving in an inappropriate manner may still have negative consequences.

This talent is ineffective against any onlooker who has already witnessed the vigilante faking a blunder within the last 24 hours.

Numb to the Pain.name: Numb to the Pain
Numb to the Pain.description: You gain a morale bonus equal to your Charisma bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting spells and effects. This bonus cannot exceed your psychic level.

Numerical Alchemy.name: Numerical Alchemy
Numerical Alchemy.description: The investigator’s skill with mental mathematics allows him to know exactly which muscle movements are necessary to mix an extract in the quickest, most efficient way. The investigator can expend one use of inspiration to mix an extract in 1 round (as opposed to 1 minute).

Numerical Alchemy, Greater.name: Numerical Alchemy, Greater
Numerical Alchemy, Greater.description:
The investigator can calculate his movements and account for his reactions to danger or unexpected situations with lightning speed. He can expend a use of inspiration to mix an extract as a standard action.

The investigator must have the numerical alchemy talent and be at least 11th level to select this talent.

Numerical Strike.name: Numerical Strike
Numerical Strike.description:
Once per day when the investigator has confirmed a critical hit with a studied strike, he can deal average damage instead of rolling damage as normal. This includes the damage dealt by the successful attack as well as the additional damage from the studied strike.

He can expend a use of inspiration to use this ability a second time per day.

Using this ability doesn’t require an action.

The investigator must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

Numerical Strike, Greater.name: Numerical Strike, Greater
Numerical Strike, Greater.description:
Once per day, when the investigator has confirmed a critical hit with a studied strike, he can deal the strike’s maximum damage instead of rolling damage as normal. This includes the damage dealt by the successful attack as well as the additional damage from the studied strike. He can expend a use of inspiration to use this ability a second time per day. Using this ability doesn’t require an action.

The investigator must have the numerical strike talent and be at least 13th level to select this talent.

Numerical Strike, Masterful.name: Numerical Strike, Masterful
Numerical Strike, Masterful.description:
The investigator can use both numerical strike and greater numerical strike three times per day. The investigator doesn’t need to expend uses of inspiration to use either ability, but he can never use either more than three times per day each.

The investigator must have the numerical strike and greater numerical strike talents and be at least 17th level to select this talent.

Oaken Skin.name: Oaken Skin
Oaken Skin.description:
At 4th level, when entering a bloodrage, your skin thickens like bark and you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your natural armor.

At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1.

Obey.name: Obey
Obey.description: As a standard action, you can issue a command to one living creature by expending 1 point of mental focus. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.2p6fzj5t03oivndd]{Command}. The target must be within 30 feet and capable of understanding your order. The target can attempt a Will save to negate this effect. If the creature is the same creature type as you, it takes a –2 penalty on this saving throw.

Obfuscate Story.name: Brouiller les pistes
Obfuscate Story.description: Quand un individu raconte un évènement, le roublard fait un test opposé de Diplomatie pour habilement ponctuer le cours de l’histoire de commentaires ou d’affirmations, troublant ainsi la capacité du conteur à se rappeler des détails spécifiques ou exacts. Si le roublard réussit, la cible ne réalise pas que les interjections du roublard l’ont embrouillée. Néanmoins, si le roublard échoue, la cible a droit à un test de Psychologie (DD égal au test de Diplomatie raté du roublard) pour s’apercevoir que celui-ci a délibérément tenté d’embrouiller son récit.

Obfuscated Spellcasting.name: Obfuscated Spellcasting
Obfuscated Spellcasting.description: When casting a spell, the arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir to make the spell being cast appear to be a different spell. The spell can be disguised as any other spell that the arcanist knows. This exploit raises the DC for a Spellcraft check to correctly identify the spell being cast by double the arcanist’s caster level. Identification attempts that fail by an amount less than double the arcanist’s caster level mistakenly identify the spell being cast as the false spell chosen by the arcanist.

Object Reading.name: Object Reading
Object Reading.description:
At 2nd level, an occultist learns how to read information from items he examines. Examining an item in this way requires him to spend 1 minute handling the item. If the item is a magic item, the occultist learns its properties and command word as if he had successfully examined the item using detect magic and succeeded at a Spellcraft check. This ability does not reveal whether the item is cursed unless the occultist’s class level is equal to or greater than the caster level of the item. If the item has any historical significance, the occultist learns one piece of information about its past (as determined by the GM).

Finally, if the item was last used no longer than 1 day ago per the occultist’s class level, the occultist learns one piece of information about the last creature to use the item. This information might be a glimpse of the creature’s appearance, a brief vision of what it saw while using the item, or perhaps its emotional state when it last used the item. The GM determines what information is gained in this way.

This functions like the psychometry occult skill unlock, but doesn’t require a skill check and can be used at will.

Object Seer.name: Object Seer
Object Seer.description:
As a full-round action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to gain insight into an object in your possession. You can ask one question, but that question must be tied in some way to the object, such as the nature of its power, the identity of the creature that last possessed it, or even where the object was when a certain event took place. You always receive an answer from the psychic impressions imprinted upon the item, but they are sometimes cryptic or misleading. This ability otherwise functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.p2kosvizylhy8vfa]{Commune}.

You must be at least 7th level to select this focus power.

Obliterate Memory.name: Obliterate Memory
Obliterate Memory.description:
As a standard action, you can target a creature within 30 feet and eliminate all memory of an event the target experienced, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{Modify Memory}. A target can attempt a Will save to negate this effect. In addition, you can cause an account of the memory erased by this ability to appear on a blank page of any book you are carrying.

You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 15th level.

You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.

Oblivion Inquisition.name: Oblivion Inquisition
Oblivion Inquisition.description: Granted Powers: Some inquisitors believe that without faith there is only oblivion. But there are some divine servants who know enough about the darkness that lies beyond faith to use it as a tool… and a weapon.

Obscuring Blow.name: Obscuring Blow
Obscuring Blow.description: Once per day, the rogue can forgo her potential to deal sneak attack damage to attempt to cloud an opponent’s vision. She must declare the use of obscuring blow before she makes the attack. If the attack hits, it does normal damage but, instead of dealing sneak attack damage (and any effect that triggers when the rogue deals sneak attack damage), the target treats all other creatures as if they had concealment, suffering a 20% miss chance on all attack rolls for a number of rounds equal to half the rogue’s level. A successful Fortitude saving throw reduces this effect to 1 round. The DC of this saving throw is equal to 10 + 1/2 the rogue’s level + the rogue’s Intelligence modifier.

Obscurity.name: Obscurity
Obscurity.description:
The vigilante is relatively unknown socially. In fact, he makes a point of keeping the life of his social identity as ordinary as possible. This social talent functions exactly as the renown social talent, but instead of improving the starting attitude of all NPCs within the community, it empowers the vigilante so that he no longer needs to succeed at Disguise checks to appear as his social identity while assuming that identity within his area of obscurity. He still has to attempt Disguise checks when NPCs within this settlement are confronted with indisputable proof that the vigilante could be more than he appears to be, such as when he uses a vigilante talent while in his social identity. This social talent counts as renown for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of social talents that list renown as a prerequisite and can be improved by such talents.

A vigilante with this talent cannot select renown, nor can he select any social talent that requires him to be famous (such as celebrity discount or celebrity perks).

Occult Dungeoneer.name: Occult Dungeoneer
Occult Dungeoneer.description: Street thieves in Absalom expect wares to be securely locked, and sometimes it takes high-quality tools and magic training to ensure there’s a meal at the end of the day. A rogue with this ability can use spell-trigger and spell-completion items as if the following spells were on a spell list to which he has access: detect secret doors, detect traps, knock, locate object, and obscure object. If the spell-trigger device allows a wielder to apply his own caster level (such as with a staff ), the rogue may use his class level as his caster level. The rogue may also use knock as a supernatural ability once per day, using his rogue level as his caster level.

Occult Final Revelation.name: Occult Final Revelation
Occult Final Revelation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become one with the spirits. You become immune to death effects, exhaustion, fatigue, nausea, negative levels, and the sickened condition. You can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{Astral Projection} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{True Seeing} once per day as spell-like abilities without requiring material components. Should you die, you rise again 2d4 days later as a ghost.

Occult Mystery.name: Occult Mystery
Occult Mystery.description:
Class Skills: An oracle with the occult mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Knowledge (arcana), and Use Magic Device to her list of class skills.

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jhyb2ana8jrk2lut]{Unseen Servant} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oplskt3tgws8ujv8]{Spectral Hand}(4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{Clairaudience/Clairvoyance} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{Scrying} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{Contact Other Plane} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0w3hvcp3gb2bhtv5]{Project Image} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{Vision} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{Moment of Prescience} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{Astral Projection} (18th).

Occult Patron.name: Occult Patron
Occult Patron.description:
• 2nd — @Compendium[pf1.spells.aa0w7tk852iqn3ni]{Detect Undead}
  • 4th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.h1ankl1l77kmnpke]{Command Undead}
  • 6th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.bp1j6n5r1lsok3kf]{Twilight Knife}
  • 8th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{Black Tentacles}
  • 10th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.1rhpxleafu8mi5yu]{Snake Staff}
  • 12th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.c1e7f0ct04k270wy]{Create Undead}
  • 14th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{Waves of Exhaustion}
  • 16th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.xmkvpl56appk20cl]{Trap the Soul}
  • 18th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.ursm11405zobemi3]{Gate}

Occulted Soul.name: Occulted Soul
Occulted Soul.description: A ninja with this trick can still her mind to bypass magical detection. The ninja can spend 1 ki point to cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{Nondetection} on herself as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to her ninja level.

Oceans Subdomain.name: Sous-domaine des Océans
Oceans Subdomain.description:
Domaine associé : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.mtDcvNtXAwM66T9v]{Eau}

Pouvoirs de domaine

Le personnage peut manipuler l’eau, la brume et la glace et conjurer des créatures de l’Eau. Il acquiert également une certaine résistance au froid.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.zUAVZeb4uCBcGgou]{Vague géante} (remplace Trait de glace)
  • Pouvoir de niveau 6 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.K7R4SXNKvzq5xmQK]{Résistance au froid}

Sorts de domaine

  • 1er — @Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{Brume de dissimulation}
  • 2e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{Vague} (remplace Nappe de brouillard)
  • 3e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.g2obld7y0lpyztes]{Marche sur l'onde} (remplace Respiration aquatique)
  • 4e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{Contrôle de l’eau}
  • 5e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{Tempête de grêle}
  • 6e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.pkm8um5t1cxsn6jh]{Cône de froid}
  • 7e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{Corps élémentaire IV} (Eau uniquement)
  • 8e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{Flétrissure}
  • 9e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.ltda70etgwje43x6]{Tsunami} (remplace Nuée d’élémentaires)

Octopus Aspect.name: Octopus Aspect
Octopus Aspect.description:
The octopus is a cunning hunter, able to contort its malleable body with ease.

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

It increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of an octopus. While in this form, you gain the aquatic subtype, a swim speed of 30 feet, low-light vision, a bite attack (1d3), a tentacles attack (no damage) with the grab ability, and Multiattack as a bonus feat.

At 8th level, you gain the jet ability (200 feet).

At 15th level, you gain the ability to produce an ink cloud (see below) and deal an amount of bludgeoning damage with your tentacles attack equal to the damage dealt by your shifter claws.

Ink Cloud (Ex): While within water, you can emit a 10-foot-radius sphere of ink once per minute as a swift action. This ink provides total concealment and persists for 1 minute.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), tentacle (B)

Offensive Defense.name: Défense offensive
Offensive Defense.description: Lorsqu’un roublard disposant de ce talent porte contre une créature une attaque de corps à corps qui inflige des dégâts d’attaque sournoise, il gagne un bonus d’esquive de +1 à la CA pour chaque dé d’attaque sournoise utilisé contre cette créature pendant 1 round.

Omnikinesis.name: Omnikinesis
Omnikinesis.description: At 20th level, a kineticist transcends the distinction between the different elements and can bend all creation to her will. By accepting 1 point of burn (in addition to any burn requirement of the kinetic blast she chooses), she can use any blast wild talent she doesn’t know. By accepting 1 point of burn as a standard action, she can change any of her wild talents into any other wild talent of the same category (such as simple blasts or defense) for 24 hours, ignoring any elemental requirements or restrictions (but not any other requirements or restrictions).

On Dark Wings.name: Ailes sombres (L. Infernal)
On Dark Wings.description:
Au niveau 15, l’ensorceleur peut faire pousser de terrifiantes ailes de chauve-souris dans son dos par une action simple. Il gagne alors une vitesse de vol de 18 m (12 cases) avec une manœuvrabilité en vol moyenne. Il peut faire disparaître ces ailes par une action libre.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.yHDVCenLfvduBVM7]{Lignage Infernal}.

One Body, Two Minds.name: One Body, Two Minds
One Body, Two Minds.description: At 15th level, once per day, you can improve the effectiveness of a single spell by having your possessing spirit channel that spell. The spell acts as though it were affected by both the @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{Silent Spell} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{Still Spell} metamagic feats. If the spell chosen is a mind-affecting spell, it also benefits from the @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{Extend Spell} metamagic feat. This ability does not use up a spell slot higher than the level of the base spell, nor does it increase the level of the base spell.

One Purpose.name: One Purpose
One Purpose.description: At 15th level, the cavalier’s mount shares the benefits of the cavalier’s guarded ability as long as both are wearing light or no armor and carrying no more than a light load. The cavalier must fight defensively or use @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{Combat Expertise} to grant these benefits, but the mount need not. In addition, the mount gains all the benefits of the cavalier’s challenge, regardless of what barding it wears.

One Touch (UC).name: Contact violent (Ki)
One Touch (UC).description:
Prérequis : niveau 12

Tant que la @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.7BfYNNkYjjBevun8]{réserve de ki} du moine contient encore 1 point de ki au moins, un moine qui maîtrise ce @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.NsP31IshAuY4gv0s]{pouvoir} peut effectuer par une action simple une attaque de contact à mains nues contre un adversaire. Il ajoute la moitié de son niveau de moine en bonus au jet de dégâts. Il peut dépenser 1 point de ki pour doubler ce bonus lors de cette attaque.

One of Those Faces.name: One of Those Faces
One of Those Faces.description: Each day, you can use disguise self as a spell-like ability for up to 10 minutes per character level. This duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 10-minute increments. Additionally, once you have used this ability, whenever you use it for the next 24 hours you must take the same alternate appearance.

One of Us.name: Un d’entre nous (L. Mort-vivant)
One of Us.description:
Au niveau 20, le corps de l’ensorceleur commence à se putréfier (son apparence exacte est laissée au choix du joueur) et les morts-vivants le considèrent comme l’un des leurs. L’ensorceleur développe une immunité au froid, aux dégâts non-létaux, à la paralysie et au sommeil. Il gagne également une RD 5/—. Les morts-vivants sans intelligence ne le remarquent pas sauf s’il les attaque. Enfin, il bénéficie d’un bonus de moral de +4 aux jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et les pouvoirs magiques des morts-vivants.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.yQ69VNhPYXSInkaA]{Lignage Mort-vivant}.

One with Abaddon.name: Osmose avec Abaddon (L. Daémon)
One with Abaddon.description:
Au niveau 20, le corps du personnage assume pleinement les pouvoirs blasphématoires de son sang daémon. Celui-ci développe une immunité à l'acide, aux effets de mort et au poison. Il gagne également RD 5/Bien et Argent, et une résistance au froid, au feu et à l'électricité de 10 points.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.NulkANVUCnQE7whi]{Lignage Daémon}.

One with Nature.name: One with Nature
One with Nature.description: At 16th level, creatures of the animal or plant types don’t attack you unless compelled to do so by magic or you attack them first. Three times per day, you can transport yourself from one tree to another tree, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{Tree Stride} with half the transport range. Moving from one tree to another in this manner is a move action. You gain these abilities even while not bloodraging.

One with the Wild.name: One with the Wild
One with the Wild.description: The vigilante must have the environmental weapon talent to select this talent. In the same terrain for which he selected that talent, he gains a +4 competence bonus on Stealth, Survival, and Perception checks.

Oneiromancy.name: Oneiromancy
Oneiromancy.description:
As a standard action, you can tamper with the minds of sleeping creatures. You plant a subconscious thought in a sleeping creature’s mind by attempting a Diplomacy or Intimidate check to modify the sleeping creature’s attitude or request a service from it. If you succeed, when the creature wakes it behaves in the way you dictated with the normal restrictions for the Diplomacy or Intimidate skill.

The target of oneiromancy remains unaware of this manipulation, though if you fail your Diplomacy check the subject might have its starting attitude toward you negatively impacted, as normal. You must be adjacent to the sleeping creature to use this ability.

Alternatively, you can use this ability as part of the casting of @Compendium[pf1.spells.ifcnx1yyw6e7ousm]{Dream}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.sbjna6uk79pysjv6]{Minor Dream}, or @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{Nightmare}. In this case, the oneiromancy effect takes place when the spell is cast.

You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. Creatures that don’t dream are immune to this effect.

Ongoing Defense.name: Ongoing Defense
Ongoing Defense.description: The psychic can increase the duration of spells that improve her psychic defenses. She can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool when she casts any intellect fortress, mental barrier, thought shield, or tower of iron will spell to extend the spell’s duration by 1 round.

Oni Bloodline.name: Lignage Oni
Oni Bloodline.description:
Esclaves des capricieux seigneurs Oni, les ancêtres du personnage ont été forcés à se soumette aux désirs hédonistes de leurs maîtres, souillant à jamais leur descendants du sang oni. Désormais, le personnage porte des pouvoirs semblables aux leurs grâce à ce vil héritage.

Compétence de classe : Déguisement

Sorts supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{Rayon affaiblissant} (niveau 3),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{Invisibilité} (niveau 5),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{Vol} (niveau 7),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{Charme-monstre} (niveau 9),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pkm8um5t1cxsn6jh]{Cône de froid} (niveau 11),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e5kw4dwf9qwty6tl]{Dissipation suprême} (niveau 13),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{Vagues d'épuisement} (niveau 15),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xmkvpl56appk20cl]{Séquestration} (niveau 17),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{Domation universelle} (niveau 19).

Dons supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{Arme de prédilection} (katana),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Attaque en puissance},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Attaques réflexes},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{Expertise du combat},
  • Guérison rapide,
  • Homme de main,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Science de l'initiative},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Talent} (Intimidation),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Volonté de fer}.

Arcane de lignage

Quand le personnage lance un sort de la branche charme ou coercition, il gagne un bonus à ses tests de Bluff, de Diplomatie et d'Intimidation égal au niveau du sort pendant 1d4 rounds.

Pouvoirs de lignage

Certains diraient le personnage maudit, mais il a appris à tirer profit de cet héritage maudit, et sa cruauté se fait de plus en plus apparente à mesure que ses pouvoirs s'accroissent.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.DTTiWIs1UoJQSK2T]{Toucher d'agonie},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 3 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.2VoHWYnkPDy0V8lV]{Forme modifiée},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 9 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.8KA4kOwFg38v3LnO]{Porté par le vent},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 15 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.FREfQdVna9y2CjR8]{Guérison des onis},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 20 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.ufAQDfGYq3BDYrt6]{Maître hédoniste}.

Oni Healing.name: Guérison des onis
Oni Healing.description:
Au niveau 15, si les points de vie du personnage deviennent inférieurs à 0, il se stabilise automatiquement et commence à regénérer 2 points de vie par round, pour un nombre de rounds égal à son niveau d'ensorceleur. Lorsqu'il se regénère ainsi, il est immunisé contre les effets de type saignement, mais s'il subit des dommages de feu ou d'acide, il ne peut plus se regénérer pour le reste de la journée (mais il reste stable). La régénération n'empêche pas le personnage de mourir si les points de vie atteignent une valeur négative égale à sa Constitution. Cette capacité n'est efficace qu'une seule fois par jour.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.TzN3TCCp5ySlZkbv]{Lignage Oni}.

Ooze Blight.name: Ooze Blight
Ooze Blight.description: A target hit by the alchemist’s bomb loses the split special quality for 1d4 rounds. In addition, against creatures with the ooze type, this bomb deals untyped damage that bypasses all resistances.

Opportunist.name: Opportunisme
Opportunist.description: Une fois par round, un roublard possédant ce talent peut tenter une attaque d’opportunité contre une créature venant juste d’être blessée au corps à corps par un autre personnage. Cette attaque est déduite du nombre d’attaques d’opportunité que le personnage peut effectuer au cours de ce round. Cette capacité ne peut pas être utilisée plus d’une fois par round et ce, même si le roublard possède le don Attaques réflexes.

Opportunist (UC).name: Opportunist (UC)
Opportunist (UC).description: The rogue can make an attack of opportunity against an opponent who has just been struck for damage in melee by another character. This attack counts as an attack of opportunity for that round and can’t be used more than once per round.

Oppress.name: Oppress
Oppress.description: At 2nd level, when the cavalier deals damage to an opponent with his Hellknight order’s favored weapon, as a swift action he learns whether that creature’s alignment is chaotic, as if he had cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.17eskras8cjynj10]{Detect Chaos} and studied the creature for 3 rounds. Additionally, if he learns that a creature is chaotic by using this ability, he gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls against it. This bonus does not stack with itself, but it does stack with the bonus from the cavalier’s challenge.

Oracle's Curse.name: Oracle's Curse
Oracle's Curse.description: Each oracle is cursed, but this curse comes with a benefit as well as a hindrance. This choice is made at 1st level, and once made, it cannot be changed. The oracle’s curse cannot be removed or dispelled without the aid of a deity. An oracle’s curse is based on her oracle level plus one for every two levels or Hit Dice other than oracle. Each oracle must a single curse.

Oracular Spellstrike.name: Oracular Spellstrike
Oracular Spellstrike.description:
By harnessing a synergy of unarmed combat and spellcasting, you have uncovered a means of channeling spell energy quickly through your unarmed strikes. This resembles the magus spellstrike ability, except it works with unarmed strikes only, no matter what other abilities you have. Additionally, it uses spells from the cleric spell list, not the magus spell list.

You must be at least 7th level before selecting this revelation.

Orc Bloodline.name: Lignage Orque
Orc Bloodline.description:
La rage des ancêtres du personnage brûle en lui, et la souillure du sang orque coule dans ses veines. Sa colère bouillonne toujours, lui donnant la force et le désir d'en avoir davantage.

Compétence de classe : Survie

Sorts supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{Mains brûlantes} (niveau 3),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{Force de taureau} (niveau 5),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{Rage} (niveau 7),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{Mur de feu} (niveau 9),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.im8z5kfg8ohowie9]{Brume mortelle} (niveau 11),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{Transformation martiale} (niveau 13),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cm3l4h4mld9j8lar]{Boule de feu à retardement} (niveau 15),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{Corps de fer} (niveau 17),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{Nuée de météores} (niveau 19).

Dons supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Attaque en puissance},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{Dur à cuire},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{Endurance},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h8Ap9cxdsXWRC6Tc]{Extension de zone d'effet},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{Force intimidante},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Robustesse},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.go4xOiSUP8R1QJ5N]{Science du renversement},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Vigueur surhumaine}.

Arcane de lignage

L'ensorceleur gagne le sous-type orque, y compris la vision dans le noir à 18 mètres et la sensibilité à la lumière. S'il a déjà le pouvoir vision dans le noir, elle passe à 27 mètres. Lorsqu'il lance un sort qui inflige des dégâts, il inflige 1 point de dégâts de plus par dé lancé.

Pouvoirs de lignage

Votre personnage a hérité du pouvoir bestial des grands seigneurs de guerre orques du passé. Il sent cette rage bouillir dans son sang et doit rester vigilant pour éviter que cette pulsion de destruction et de dévastation ne le consume complètement.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.DXoZQV6YvDduOYDT]{Toucher de rage},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 3 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Q8xnt84nTaUmKgo1]{Sans peur},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 9 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.jLg2G4wpQgL2zyI5]{Force de la Bête},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 15 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.9gTGYJwawvYXOiXK]{Pouvoir des géants},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 20 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.X1x6gUALY07XDXH8]{Seigneur de guerre réincarné}.

Order.name: Order
Order.description:
At 1st level, a cavalier must pledge himself to a specific order. The order grants the cavalier a number of bonuses, class skills, and special abilities. In addition, each order includes a number of edicts that the cavalier must follow. If he violates any of these edicts, he loses the benefits from his order’s challenge ability for 24 hours. The violation of an edict is subject to GM interpretation.

A cavalier cannot change his order without undertaking a lengthy process to dedicate himself to a new cause. When this choice is made, he immediately loses all of the benefits from his old order. He must then follow the edicts of his new order for one entire level without gaining any benefits from that order. Once accomplished, he gains all of the bonuses from his new order. Note that the names of these orders might vary depending upon the campaign setting or GM’s preference.

Order Inquisition.name: Inquisition de l’ordre
Order Inquisition.description:
La plupart des inquisiteurs combattent les aberrations et les créatures démoniaques mais aussi le chaos de l’hérésie. Ils se reposent sur les maximes et les atours de la loi pour les aider dans leur lutte.

Pouvoirs accordés :

Manteau contre le chaos (Mag). Le personnage peut utiliser protection contre le chaos sur sa personne ou sur autrui, comme un pouvoir magique. Chaque jour, il peut lancer ce pouvoir un nombre de minutes égal à son niveau d’inquisiteur (1 au minimum). Cette durée n’est pas forcément continue mais doit se découper en segments d’une minute.

Ordre impérieux (Mag). Au niveau 8, l’inquisiteur peut utiliser injonction suprême mais elle n’affecte qu’une cible. Chaque jour, il peut se servir de ce pouvoir un nombre de fois égal à 3 + modificateur de Sagesse.

Order of Vengeance.name: Order of Vengeance
