Scar Hex.name: Scar Hex
Scar Hex.description:
This hex curses a single target touched with horrible scars of the witch's choosing, whether something as simple as a single letter on the target's forehead or blotchy, burnlike scars on his body. The target may make a Will save to resist this hex. These scars do not interfere with the target's senses or prevent it from using abilities, but may affect social interactions. They persist through disguises and shapechanging.

The witch can user her hexes on the scarred target at a range of up to 1 mile, and she is considered to have a body part from the target for the purpose of scrying and similar divination spells. The witch can withdraw this hex from a target as a move action at any range.

The number of supernatural scars the witch can maintain at once is equal to her Intelligence bonus; once she reaches this limit, she must remove the scar from a current victim in order to mark another. Effects that remove curses can remove the scar.

Scavenger.name: Scavenger
Scavenger.description: A rogue with this talent can pick up and stow an object as a swift action instead of two separate move actions. She gains a +2 bonus on Sleight of Hand checks to pick the pockets of creatures that are stunned or disabled.

Scent.name: Odorat (Rage)
Scent.description: Le barbare bénéficie de la capacité d’odorat lorsqu’il est en rage et peut utiliser cette capacité pour situer des ennemis invisibles.

Scent (1 pt).name: Scent (1 pt)
Scent (1 pt).description: An eidolon's sense of smell becomes quite acute. The eidolon gains the scent special quality, allowing it to detect opponents within 30 feet by sense of smell. If the opponent is upwind, the range increases to 60 feet; if downwind, it drops to 15 feet. Strong scents can be detected at twice the normal range. Scent does not allow the eidolon to precisely locate the creature, only to detect its presence. It can detect the direction with a move action. The eidolon can pinpoint the creature's location if it is within 5 feet. The eidolon can use scent to track creatures.

Scent (UC).name: Odorat (RageU)
Scent (UC).description: Le barbare gagne le pouvoir spécial odorat. Il peut l’utiliser pour localiser l’emplacement occupé par les ennemis invisibles.

Scent (UC) (1 pt).name: Scent (UC) (1 pt)
Scent (UC) (1 pt).description: The eidolon’s sense of smell becomes quite acute. The eidolon gains the scent special quality, allowing it to detect opponents within 30 feet by sense of smell. If the opponent is upwind, the range increases to 60 feet; if the opponent is downwind, the range drops to 15 feet. Strong scents can be detected at twice the normal range. Scent does not allow the eidolon to precisely locate the creature, only to detect its presence. It can detect the direction as a move action. The eidolon can pinpoint the creature’s location if it is within 5 feet. The eidolon can use scent to track creatures.

School Power.name: École privilégiée (L. Profane)
School Power.description:
Au niveau 15, l’ensorceleur choisit une école de magie. Le DD des jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts de l’ensorceleur appartenant à cette école augmente de +2. Ce bonus se cumule avec celui provenant du don@Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{École renforcée}.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Y926YHNobEojovx4]{Lignage Profane}.

School Understanding.name: Compréhension des écoles
School Understanding.description:
L’arcaniste choisit une école de magie profane issue de la liste des écoles de magie des magiciens mais il n’a pas à choisir d’école d’opposition. Il gagne un pouvoir de cette école, comme s’il était un magicien de niveau 1, en appliquant son modificateur de Charisme et non d’Intelligence. Il doit choisir un pouvoir s’obtenant au niveau 1 et son nombre d’utilisations quotidiennes est limité à 3 + son modificateur de Charisme.

Par une action rapide, l’arcaniste peut dépenser 1 point de son réservoir arcanique pour développer sa compréhension. Il remplace alors le niveau de magicien par son niveau d’arcaniste vis-à-vis de ce pouvoir pendant un nombre de rounds égal à son modificateur de Charisme (1 au minimum).

Pendant cette période, il a aussi accès à l’autre pouvoir disponible au niveau 1 pour l’école choisie. Quand il utilise cette exploitation, il ne bénéficie pas des autres pouvoirs liés à l’école, comme ceux que l’on obtient au niveau 8.

Si l’arcaniste possède déjà une école (ou s’il en obtient une plus tard), cette exploitation lui permet de cumuler ses niveaux d’arcaniste avec ceux qu’il possède dans l’autre classe pour déterminer ses pouvoirs et aptitudes d’école.

Scorching Heat.name: Scorching Heat
Scorching Heat.description: At 12th level, your weapons conduct heat. You deal 1d6 additional points of fire damage with natural weapons and melee attacks made with metal weapons. You also deal 2d6 points of fire damage per round to any creature you grapple. This does not damage your equipment.

Scorpion Aspect.name: Scorpion Aspect
Scorpion Aspect.description:
The aspect of the scorpion invokes a hidden menace with a poisonous sting.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 competence bonus on Stealth checks and grapple combat maneuver checks.

This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a giant scorpion. While in this form, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, tremorsense with a range of 10 feet, two primary claw attacks (1d6) with the grab ability, and a secondary sting attack (1d6).

At 8th level, the range of your tremorsense increases to 20 feet, and you gain a +4 racial bonus on Climb and Perception checks.

At 15th level, when you make an attack of opportunity with your sting attack or maintain a grapple and deal damage with your sting attack, that attack also applies the following poison.

Poison (Ex): Sting—injury; save Fort DC = 10 + half your shifter level + your Constitution modifier; frequency 1/ round for 6 rounds; effect 1d3 Strength damage; cure 2 consecutive saves.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Pincers (B), sting (P)

Scorpion Bloodline.name: Scorpion Bloodline
Scorpion Bloodline.description:
Whether your ancestors served a scorpion goddess or simply worked closely with more mundane members of the species, the venom from these arachnids has seeped down through generations into your blood.

Class Skill: Climb.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6vx3lvbhp6h220wq]{Thorn Javelin} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3mfmhx8avu7h3iom]{Spider Climb} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{Poison} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pa6mgkl4caihdrhm]{Giant Vermin} (scorpions only) (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j8fufy7sr3bty5du]{Vermin Shape II} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{Sirocco} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{Creeping Doom} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{Horrid Wilting} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jg2n48yy9pk9mpdr]{Transmute Blood To Acid} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.QvlxYVVsBDlykPKe]{Arcane Strike},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{Blind-Fight},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes},
  •  Disruptive Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.VMVAqGze4cs3naya]{Nimble Moves},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Climb),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{Stealthy}.

Bloodline Arcana: You are trained in the use of poison and cannot accidentally poison yourself when applying poison to a weapon.

Scourge Curse.name: Scourge Curse
Scourge Curse.description:
You are a blight on the natural world. Bizarre natural hazards develop within a 300-ft radius around you whenever you linger in a natural area for more than 10 minutes, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ug4qh4cuh5f9ralf]{Curse Terrain, Lesser}. You cannot choose the hazards or their locations. However, your movement is unimpeded by undergrowth, as a druid’s woodland stride ability, as plants wither away in your footsteps.

At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.23pgt0f34obki95q]{Feast Of Ashes} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.1msv71n204g06fbe]{Explosion Of Rot} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known.

At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.25iy235izs71qlns]{Swarm Skin} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.

Scourge of the Enemy.name: Scourge of the Enemy
Scourge of the Enemy.description: At 8th level, select one religion that is a rival or opponent of your religion. You treat members of this religion as if they were your favored enemy (as the ranger class ability), gaining a +2 bonus on the appropriate rolls. At 13th level, these bonuses increase to +4, and at 18th level, the bonuses increase to +6. These bonuses do not stack with other favored enemy bonuses (use the highest bonus that applies).

Scrap Bomb.name: Scrap Bomb
Scrap Bomb.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it explode into shards of shrapnel that deal piercing damage. A creature that takes a direct hit from a scrap bomb takes 1 point of bleed damage per die of bomb damage unless it succeeds at a Reflex save.

Scribe Scroll.name: Écriture de parchemins
Scribe Scroll.description: Un magicien de niveau 1 acquiert automatiquement le don @Compendium[pf1.feats.tlRu8SYjzA7WCHN7]{Écriture de parchemins} comme don supplémentaire.

Scroll Mastery.name: Scroll Mastery
Scroll Mastery.description:
Whenever the magus uses a scroll, he may expend 1 point from his arcane pool to allow him to calculate the DC for any spell contained on the scroll using his Intelligence modifier, instead of the minimum modifier needed cast a spell of that level.

The magus must be at least 6th level before selecting this arcana.

Scry Slip.name: Scry Slip
Scry Slip.description: Whenever a rogue with this talent is targeted by a scrying effect that allows a Will save, the caster of the divination must succeed at a caster level check (DC = 15 + the rogue’s class level). This talent wards the rogue and any objects she is holding or carrying. An investigator can select this talent in place of an investigator talent.

Scryer Subschool.name: Champ d'étude Scrutation
Scryer Subschool.description:
École associée : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.ctFPHquS2GydVoZV]{Divination}

Pouvoirs d'école

Les devins maîtrisent les sorts qui permettent d’espionner à distance, de formuler des prophéties ou d’explorer le monde.

  • Pouvoir passif : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.S0CoHzJwn5NlgQU9]{Mis en garde}
  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.OLh9DNRqDf7yjSwM]{Sens à distance} (remplace Chance du devin)
  • Pouvoir de niveau 8 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.ID7tKA56K3gOoWBM]{Adepte de la scrutation}

Scrying Adept.name: Adepte de la scrutation (É. Div)
Scrying Adept.description:
Au niveau 8, lorsque quelqu’un l’observe par magie, le devin en est automatiquement conscient, comme s’il était sous l’effet d’un sort permanent de @Compendium[pf1.spells.viq93vkjaungdbul]{détection de la scrutation}. De plus, chaque fois que le devin espionne une créature par magie, on considère que la connaissance qu’il a de cette créature est meilleure (d’une catégorie) que ce qu’elle est normalement. Les cibles dont le personnage a « une grande connaissance », quant à elles, subissent un malus de -10 au jet de sauvegarde pour résister à la tentative de scrutation.

Retour à l'@Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.ctFPHquS2GydVoZV]{École de Divination}.

Scrying Familiarity.name: Scrying Familiarity
Scrying Familiarity.description: You are well acquainted with scrying sensors. You can roll twice and take the better result on saving throws against divination (scrying) spells and effects, on Perception checks to notice scrying sensors, and on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance when you use a scrying spell or effect. If you notice a magical sensor, you can attempt a Stealth check opposed by the caster’s caster level check to avoid being detected by the sensor.

Scythe of Evil.name: Faux Maléfique
Scythe of Evil.description: Au niveau 8, le personnage peut accorder à une arme, par le toucher, la propriété impie pour un nombre de rounds égal à la moitié de son niveau de prêtre. Il peut utiliser ce pouvoir une fois par jour au niveau 8 et une fois de plus par jour tous les quatre niveaux par la suite.

Sczarni Smuggler.name: Sczarni Smuggler
Sczarni Smuggler.description: The rogue has picked up Sczarni tricks for making masterful forgeries and using bribery to evade trade rules. The rogue needs to learn only the approximate appearance of a document that doesn’t require a particular person’s signature to accurately forge the document with Linguistics (gaining a +8 bonus on the check to create the forgery, as if she had seen a similar document before). The rogue needs only a small sample of a person’s handwriting to make a convincing forgery of great length in that person’s handwriting. The rogue can always take 10 on Diplomacy checks to offer bribes. In addition, the rogue automatically gains an extra advantage at the start of a pursuit (Ultimate Intrigue 142) in an urban environment.

Seamless Guise.name: Seamless Guise
Seamless Guise.description: A vigilante knows how to behave in a way that appears perfectly proper and normal for his current identity. Should anyone suspect him of being anything other than what he appears to be while either in his social or vigilante identity, he can attempt a Disguise check with a +20 circumstance bonus to appear as his current identity, and not as his other identity.

Searing Flame.name: Searing Flame
Searing Flame.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn —
Prerequisite burning infusion

Over time, your burning infusion sears away your foe’s fire resistance. When you roll burn damage from burning infusion against a foe, decrease the foe’s fire resistance by an amount equal to the unmodified burn damage; don’t apply fire resistance to this roll for the purpose of determining the reduction.

This decrease lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your kineticist level. These decreases stack, to a minimum resistance of 0.

Searing Flesh.name: Searing Flesh
Searing Flesh.description:
Element fire; Type defense (Su); Level —; Burn 0

Your body becomes painfully hot. Whenever a creature hits you with a natural attack or an unarmed strike, that creature takes 1 point of fire damage per 4 kineticist levels you possess (minimum 1 point of fire damage). A creature in a grapple with you takes double this amount of damage at the end of each of its turns. Weapons that strike you also take this damage, though the damage is unlikely to penetrate the weapon’s hardness.

By accepting 1 point of burn, you can increase this damage by 1 point per 4 kineticist levels you possess until the next time your burn is removed. You can increase the damage in this way up to seven times.

Whenever you accept burn while using a fire wild talent, the surging flame causes your searing flesh to deal double its current amount of damage for 1 round (a creature in a grapple with you takes a total of four times as much damage as normal). You can dismiss or restore this effect as an immediate action.

Searing Heat.name: Searing Heat
Searing Heat.description: At 15th level, your body becomes as hot as a salamander’s. You deal 1d6 additional points of fire damage with natural weapons and melee attacks made with metal weapons. In addition, you deal 2d6 points of fire damage per round to any creature you grapple. This heat does not damage your equipment. You can activate or deactivate this effect as a free action.

Seasons Subdomain.name: Sous-domaine des Saisons
Seasons Subdomain.description:
Domaine associé : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.qCSvyJt8O7tNF5QC]{Climat}

Pouvoirs de domaine

Le personnage contrôle les tempêtes et le ciel et peut faire tomber les foudres divines sur le monde.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.j6Hz8L9OeGUq5v23]{Insensible aux saisons} (remplace Coup de tonnerre)
  • Pouvoir de niveau 8 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.FZdWscHJvJpGPoDz]{Seigneur des tempêtes}

Sorts de domaine

  • 1er — @Compendium[pf1.spells.k4whhwm1dsz2upkm]{Baie nourricière} (remplace Brume de dissimulation)
  • 2e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Nappe de brouillard}
  • 3e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.rrheoc0h80mbss7z]{Appel de la foudre}
  • 4e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.gq7np9mwtfd500zg]{Flétrissement végétal} (remplace Tempête de neige)
  • 5e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{Tempête de grêle}
  • 6e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.g9koefk7x9szoheo]{Contrôle des vents}
  • 7e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{Contrôle du climat}
  • 8e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{Explosion de lumière} (remplace Cyclone)
  • 9e — @Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{Tempête vengeresse}

Second Animal Focus.name: Second Animal Focus
Second Animal Focus.description:
At 8th level, whenever a hunter uses her animal focus ability, she selects two different animal aspects for herself instead of one, and can assign two aspects to her companion instead of one. As with the companion’s previous aspect, the second one does not count against the minutes per day a hunter can take on an aspect.

If the hunter’s animal companion is dead and the hunter has applied the companion’s animal aspect to herself, that aspect does not count toward her maximum of two aspects at once. The hunter can still apply only one of her dead companion’s aspects to herself, not both.

Second Chance.name: Second Chance
Second Chance.description: At 8th level, you can give an enemy a second chance to correct the error of its ways. Once per day as a standard action, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.qr6qcx8zqum6jhc4]{Atonement} as a spell-like ability, targeting a creature that has violated the tenets of a religion you both share or that freely desires to convert to your alignment. If costly material components are required for the atonement, you may choose to accept a permanent negative level as a sacrifice in place of those components. The target of this effect also receives the benefits of a cure serious wounds spell as part of the effects of the atonement.

Second Judgment.name: Second Judgment
Second Judgment.description: At 8th level, whenever an inquisitor uses her judgment ability, she selects two different judgments, instead of one. This only consumes one use of her judgment ability. As a swift action, she can change one of these judgments to another type.

Secret.name: Secret
Secret.description: Le chaman reçoit un don de métamagie comme don supplémentaire. Il doit remplir les conditions requises pour le choisir.

Secrets Inquisition.name: Inquisition de secret
Secrets Inquisition.description:
Le personnage a appris à garder ses secrets près de lui, et ceux de ses ennemis encore plus près.

Pouvoirs accordés :

Détection des secrets (Sur). Le personnage apprend à détecter les secrets de n’importe quelle créature, et pas juste ses pensées. Chaque fois qu’il lance détection des angoisses, détection des désirs ou détection des pensées ou utilise n’importe lequel de ses sorts comme un pouvoir magique, il peut choisir d’obtenir les effets d’un des deux autres sorts à la place. Le personnage n’est jamais submergé par la haute valeur de caractéristique d’une cible de ces sorts.

Livre fermé (Mag). Au niveau 8, il devient difficile pour les ennemis du personnage de dévoiler ses secrets. Le personnage est sous un effet d'antidétection constant, comme s’il avait lancé le sort sur lui-même.

Secrets of City.name: Secrets of City
Secrets of City.description:
Once per day when you cast a divination spell affecting creatures or areas in urban environments, you can double the spell’s range.

At 7th level and 15th level, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

Sedition Inquisition.name: Sedition Inquisition
Sedition Inquisition.description: Granted Powers: Your deity calls you to cast down a hostile government. Stealth is a class skill for you.

Seduction.name: Seduction
Seduction.description:
The witch uses enthralling movements to fascinate a single creature within 60 feet that can see the witch. A Will save negates this effect. If the target is (or could be) sexually attracted to the witch, the save DC is increased by 2. The effect lasts for 1 round, but the witch can extend this effect for 1 additional round (up to a total number of rounds equal to her class level) by taking a standard action to continue her enthralling movements. Whether or not the target succeeds at its save, it cannot be the target of this ability again for 1 day.

At 8th level, the fascination effect lasts for 2 additional rounds after the witch ceases taking a standard action to maintain it. This is a mind-affecting charm effect.

Seduction Inquisition.name: Seduction Inquisition
Seduction Inquisition.description: Granted Powers: Your deity blesses your attempts to use sex and love for a higher purpose.

See Invisibility.name: See Invisibility
See Invisibility.description: At 9th level, a spiritualist gains the ability to see many things normally hidden from sight. She gains the ability to use @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{See Invisibility} as a spell-like ability once per day, with a duration of 10 minutes.

See It Coming.name: See It Coming
See It Coming.description: At 3rd level, you gain a +1 luck bonus on the saving throw type of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will). As a full-round action, you can change which saving throw your luck bonus applies to. At 7th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +5 at 19th level.

See Magic.name: See Magic
See Magic.description: The arcanist can see magical auras. If she expends 1 point from her arcane reservoir, for 1 minute she instantly recognizes magic item auras and spell effects (as @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{Detect Magic}). During this time, she is treated as if she had studied each aura for 3 rounds and she treats her Knowledge (arcana) skill check as if she had rolled a 15 on the d20. In addition, if she touches a magic item during this time, she can immediately identify its properties using Spellcraft without needing to spend 3 rounds examining the object. If an enemy possesses the object, the arcanist must first succeed at a melee touch attack to identify the item.

See in Darkness (3 pts).name: See in Darkness (3 pts)
See in Darkness (3 pts).description:
An eidolon can see perfectly in darkness of any kind, including that created by deeper darkness.

The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

See in Darkness (ROG).name: See in Darkness (ROG)
See in Darkness (ROG).description: The rogue gains the see in darkness ability (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 301). A rogue must have darkvision before choosing this talent.

See in Darkness (SAM).name: See in Darkness (SAM)
See in Darkness (SAM).description: At 15th level the samurai can see perfectly in darkness, even magical darkness, as the universal monster ability of the same name.

See the Unseen.name: See the Unseen
See the Unseen.description:
A ninja with this trick learns how to see that which cannot be seen. As a swift action, the ninja can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{See Invisibility}, using her level as the caster level.

Each use of this ability uses up 1 ki point.

Seek Retribution.name: Seek Retribution
Seek Retribution.description: At 8th level, once per day after receiving a request for aid from a legal authority or an aggrieved party regarding the breaking of an oath, whenever the cavalier encounters the oath-breaking creature, he can choose to vehemently exact retribution. As a swift action, the cavalier can grant himself a competence bonus equal to his Charisma modifier on all attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and opposed checks against the oathbreaking creature. These bonuses last for 1 round per level.

Seemless Shapechanger.name: Seemless Shapechanger
Seemless Shapechanger.description:
The vigilante seamlessly adopts any persona he assumes with magic. The vigilante adds his seamless guise bonus to the bonus on Disguise checks that he gains to assume the shape of another creature with a polymorph spell or effect.

A vigilante must have the shapechanger subtype to select this talent.

Seismic Master.name: Seismic Master
Seismic Master.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 9; Burn 0

You can focus on your connection to earth and create a localized tremor, as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.a5gcbpwfhu4hh5ic]{Earthquake} spell.

Seize the Initiative.name: Prendre l'Initiative
Seize the Initiative.description: Lorsque le prêtre ou ses alliés déterminent leur initiative, il peut donner à l’un d’entre eux situé dans un rayon de 9 m la capacité de lancer deux fois le dé et de choisir n’importe quel résultat. Cependant, il doit déclarer son intention avant que le résultat soit révélé. Le prêtre peut utiliser cette capacité un nombre de fois par jour égal à 3 + son modificateur de Sagesse.

Self Reliant.name: Self Reliant
Self Reliant.description: At 2nd level, the ronin learns to rely solely on himself, even in the most difficult of times. Whenever the ronin fails a Will saving throw against an effect with a duration greater than 1 round, he can attempt another saving throw at the end of the second round of the effect. If he makes this saving throw, it has the same effect as if he had made the original save (negating part or all of the effect). In addition, whenever a ronin is brought below 0 hit points, on his next turn he can roll twice to stabilize, taking the better result.

Self Telekinesis.name: Self Telekinesis
Self Telekinesis.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0

You use your telekinetic abilities to move yourself. Otherwise, this wild talent functions like flame jet.

Self Telekinesis, Greater.name: Self Telekinesis, Greater
Self Telekinesis, Greater.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite self telekinesis

You have greater control over your self telekinesis. Otherwise, this wild talent functions like greater flame jet.

Self-Assurance.name: Self-Assurance
Self-Assurance.description:
Overwhelming confidence in your success brings you closer to your goals, and you know that your superiority has destined you for greatness. As an immediate action, you can gain a morale bonus equal to half your psychic level (minimum 1) on a single ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or skill check. You must declare that you are using this ability before attempting the roll in question. If you succeed at the check, you regain 1 point in your phrenic pool.

You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier.

Self-Control.name: Self-Control
Self-Control.description: You possess remarkable control over your own body, and gain a +2 competence bonus on saving throws made against enchantment spells of the charm or compulsion subschool.

Self-Perfection Discipline.name: Self-Perfection Discipline
Self-Perfection Discipline.description:
You take a holistic view of psychic power, believing that you must hone both your mental and physical attributes to remain in balance. The focus you find while exercising, fasting, and otherwise tending to your body broadens your psychic powers.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pysrx5kxfjvsjjsi]{Expeditious Retreat} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.usdv1eqvibmxun6x]{Bear's Endurance} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{Haste} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{Freedom of Movement} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wuispaydz8jvw3io]{Echolocation} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{Transformation} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{Ethereal Jaunt} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{Iron Body} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.au6p72aztjhtokwr]{Akashic Form} (18th).

Self-Realization Subdomain.name: Self-Realization Subdomain
Self-Realization Subdomain.description:
Replacement Domain Spells:

  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.5v3j49r4mdq9rbx6]{Paragon Surge} (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Race Guide 48; always matches your actual race)
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.dckgxyd6ariois1s]{Primal Scream}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{Transformation}

Self-Resurrection.name: Self-Resurrection
Self-Resurrection.description:
From the ashes of your body springs forth new life. At 16th level, once per day when you are reduced below 0 hit points while you are bloodraging, you can call upon the power in your blood to pull yourself back from death. This functions as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.qiiis9ekgy3syu7j]{Breath Of Life} spell cast upon yourself.

At 20th level, this instead functions as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.4re1j2w8wkvsvnsi]{Heal} spell, except that the healing can return you to life as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.qiiis9ekgy3syu7j]{Breath Of Life}, using your bloodrager level as your caster level. Using this ability does not take an action. This ability does not function if your body is completely destroyed by an effect such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.sxyiwj0z95piv96i]{Disintegrate}.

Send Senses.name: Sens à distance (É. Div)
Send Senses.description:
Par une action simple, le magicien place un senseur magique à une portée intermédiaire (30 m (20 c) + 3 m (2 c) par niveau de magicien), dans un endroit situé dans son champ de vision et vers lequel il dispose d’une ligne d’effet. Il peut voir ou entendre (mais pas les deux) à travers ce senseur pendant un nombre de rounds égal à la moitié de son niveau de magicien (minimum 1 round).

À part cela, le senseur fonctionne comme un sort de @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{clairaudience/clairvoyance} avec un NLS égal à son niveau de magicien.

Il peut utiliser cette capacité un nombre de fois par jour égal à 3 + son modificateur d’Intelligence.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Owu0KhwUC4v9JUwB]{Champ d'étude Scrutation}.

Sensed (Stare).name: Sensed (Stare)
Sensed (Stare).description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to Stealth checks.

Serpent Companion.name: Compagnon Serpent
Serpent Companion.description: Compagnon serpent (Ext). Au niveau 4, le personnage acquiert les services d’un compagnon animal. Pour déterminer les caractéristiques du compagnon animal, on considère que le personnage possède un niveau effectif de druide égal à son niveau de prêtre -2 (les druides qui choisissent ce pouvoir dans le cadre de leur aptitude de classe de pacte avec la nature utilisent leur niveau de druide -2 pour déterminer les capacités de leur compagnon animal). Il doit s'agir d'une vipère ou d'un serpent constricteur.

Serpent Fangs.name: Serpent Fangs
Serpent Fangs.description:
At 1st level, you grow serpentine fangs. These fangs are treated as a natural weapon, granting you a bite attack as a primary natural weapon. This attack deals damage equal to 1d8 (1d6 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

At 4th level, your fangs are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

At 8th level, the damage increases to 1d10 (1d8 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

Serpent in the Sun.name: Serpent in the Sun
Serpent in the Sun.description:
So long as you are exposed to at least 4 hours of sunlight per day, you no longer need to eat to survive and you gain +2 bonus on saves against diseases.

At 5th level, you become immune to nonmagical diseases and no longer need to drink water to survive.

At 10th level, you become immune to magical diseases, gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against poisons, and only need to sleep half as long to rest or recover from fatigue or exhaustion.

At 15th level, you become immune to poison and fatigue. You lose these benefits if you fail to spend at least 4 hours in sunlight in a 24-hour period.

Serpent's Fang.name: Croc du serpent (L. Serpentin)
Serpent's Fang.description:
Au niveau 1, l’ensorceleur peut faire apparaitre des crocs par une action libre. Ces crocs fonctionnent comme des armes naturelles qui infligent 1d4 points de dégâts plus son modificateur de Force (1d3 points s’il est de taille P) ainsi que du poison (Morsure – blessure ; JS Vig DD 10 + la moitié de son niveau d’ensorceleur + son modificateur de Constitution ; fréquence 1/round pendant 6 rounds ; effet affaiblissement temporaire de 1 Con ; guérison 1 réussite). Au niveau 5, ces crocs fonctionnent comme des armes magiques pour ce qui est de percer les résistances aux dégâts, et l’affaiblissement causé par le poison passe à 1d2 points de Constitution. Au niveau 7, il faut réussir deux jets de sauvegarde consécutifs pour guérir du poison. Au niveau 11, l’affaiblissement causé par le poison passe à 1d4 points de Constitution. L’ensorceleur peut utiliser cette capacité pendant un nombre de rounds par jour égal à 3 + son modificateur de Charisme.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.W3xO7Z2Zes3l1Rf0]{Lignage Serpentin}.

Serpent's Tail.name: Serpent's Tail
Serpent's Tail.description: At 9th level, you can transform your legs into a slithering serpentine tail as a free action. Your speed is reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet), and you can’t be tripped. Your footwear melds into your body and is nonfunctional unless it provides a constant bonus and does not need to be activated. You also gain a tail slap natural attack that deals 1d8 points of damage (1d6 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier. At 15th level, your reach with your tail slap increases by 5 feet. These effects last a number of minutes per day equal to your sorcerer level; the duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

Serpentfriend.name: Ami des serpents (L. Serpentin)
Serpentfriend.description:
Au niveau 3, l’ensorceleur peut utiliser @Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{communication avec les animaux} à volonté pour dialoguer avec les reptiles (y compris les diverses espèces de dinosaures, de lézards et les autres créatures à sang froid). Il acquiert également un serpent venimeux/une vipère comme familier (son niveau de magicien effectif est son niveau d’ensorceleur -2).

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.W3xO7Z2Zes3l1Rf0]{Lignage Serpentin}.

Serpentine Bloodline.name: Lignage Serpentin
Serpentine Bloodline.description:
Le lignage de l’ensorceleur porte la trace des anciennes races serpentines qui gouvernaient le monde lorsque celui-ci était jeune. Ses ancêtres étaient sans doute des esclaves privilégiés qui ont reçu de la part de leurs maîtres reptiliens le don de concevoir froidement des ruses et de manipuler les autres de manière subtile. La tromperie et les charmes hypnotiques font peut-être partie de la nature de l’ensorceleur, mais il peut aussi choisir de s’opposer à son héritage et de poursuivre la quête de la vérité.

Compétence de classe : Diplomatie

Sorts supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{Hypnose} (niveau 3),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l7e01shgg8c44zfg]{Ralentissement du poison} (niveau 5),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1zmn8vqy3s5l9kiv]{Convocation de monstre III} (reptiles uniquement) (niveau 7),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{Empoisonnement} (niveau 9),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d8hypv6zdyan3rzr]{Immobilisation de monstre} (niveau 11),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{Suggestion de groupe} (niveau 13),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.et3440o24hcgrfwl]{Convocation de monstre VII} (reptiles uniquement) (niveau 15),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oq3mqv5vovjkoa2p]{Danse irrésistible} (niveau 17),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{Domination universelle} (niveau 19).

Dons supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Attaques réflexes},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{Fourberie},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{Discret},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SMyexRzOm5PfjT5I]{Doigts de fée},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{Incantation silencieuse},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{Magie de guerre},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{Persuasion},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Talent} (Bluff).

Arcane de lignage

Les pouvoirs de coercition de l’ensorceleur fonctionnent même sur les créatures bestiales. Chaque fois qu’il lance un sort mental ou du registre du langage, celui-ci affecte les animaux, les créatures magiques et les humanoïdes monstrueux comme s’il s’agissait d’humanoïdes comprenant la langue que l’ensorceleur parle.

Pouvoirs de lignage

Le sang des serpents, à la fois fourbe et hypnotique, coule dans les veines du personnage et ajoute une grâce insidieuse et séduisante à ses pouvoirs magiques.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.h6Ook9Q9qF0lpYGL]{Croc du serpent},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 3 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.uvk4mwFGtss9mx6W]{Ami des serpents},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 9 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.K3aX1o5greborn8s]{Peau de serpent},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 15 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.jvjem7KJudSxt6yR]{Nid de vipères},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 20 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.HHscT91EHzzcNbFB]{Âme écailleuse}.

Serpentine Swim.name: Serpentine Swim
Serpentine Swim.description: At 4th level, you can swim sinuously, like a snake. You gain a swim speed equal to your base speed.

Servant of Winter.name: Servant of Winter
Servant of Winter.description:
As a full-round action, you can summon a single ice elemental (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 114) to serve you.

At 7th level, you can summon a Medium ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqri3zf6mzgd4di6]{Summon Monster IV}.

At 11th level, you can summon a Huge ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mf6k8tg8xu0wedoz]{Summon Monster VI}.

At 15th level, you can summon an elder ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.j91n23p4tfjixp3s]{Summon Monster VIII}.

You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 15th level.

You must be at least 7th level before selecting this revelation.

Servitor.name: Servitor
Servitor.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to summon a servitor. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.kyo0kwhw2jhuztju]{Summon Monster I}, but you can use it only to summon a single creature, and the effect lasts for 1 minute.

At 4th level and every 3 levels thereafter, the level of the summon monster spell increases by 1, to a maximum of @Compendium[pf1.spells.et3440o24hcgrfwl]{Summon Monster VII} at 19th level. You can’t have more than one servitor in effect at a time.

At any time, you can expend 1 point of mental focus as a free action to extend the duration of an active servitor by 1 minute.

Set-Up.name: Set-Up
Set-Up.description: When you successfully hit a target with a sneak attack in melee, you can choose to forgo your additional sneak attack damage to make the target more vulnerable to one of your allies adjacent to it. The first melee attack that ally makes against the target before the beginning of your next turn treats the target as flanked, even if your ally is not flanking the target. This has no effect on creatures you could not flank with that ally, even if the ally was properly positioned.

Sever Alignment.name: Sever Alignment
Sever Alignment.description: When making a sneak attack against an opponent with an alignment subtype, a rogue with this talent can forgo her sneak attack damage to scramble the creature’s metaphysical nature. If the attack succeeds, the rogue deals weapon damage as normal, and the target must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the rogue’s level + the rogue’s Intelligence modifier) or lose all damage reduction overcome by aligned weapons (such as DR 10/good), lose all regeneration overcome by aligned sources (such as regeneration 10 [good]), and lose the ability to cast spells and use spell-like abilities with alignment descriptors for 1 round for every 2d6 points of sneak attack damage the rogue would have dealt (minimum 1 round). The rogue must have the aligned sneak attack talent to select this talent.

Shackle Smash.name: Shackle Smash
Shackle Smash.description: Perhaps trained to remove or destroy restraints from slaves and prisoners by the Twilight Talons or Bellflower Network, a vigilante with this talent can choose to make no more noise than people talking when he attempts a sunder combat maneuver check or attempts a Strength check to break an object. He ignores half an object’s hardness when attempting sunder combat maneuver checks and when attacking nonmagical objects.

Shades of Gray.name: Nuances de gris
Shades of Gray.description:
Un roublard avec ce talent utilise des astuces psychologiques et émotionnelles pour se protéger des tentatives visant à lire son alignement. Il peut bénéficier des avantages d’@Compendium[pf1.spells.vsr1e8ib0hfhbnxb]{alignement indétectable} quand il le souhaite, mais doit être conscient pour maintenir l’effet.

Ce talent est pensé pour le roublard unchained, mais le MJ peut autoriser un roublard à le sélectionner. En revanche, il n’est pas accessible aux autres classes ou classes alternatives qui peuvent obtenir des talents de roublard (comme le ninja).

Shades of Rage.name: Shades of Rage
Shades of Rage.description: At 4th level, whenever you enter a bloodrage, the light level within 30 feet of you decreases by one step. Natural light is always affected, but magical illumination dispels this ability if the caster of the light effect succeeds at a caster level check against a DC equal to 10 + your class level.

Shadow Armament.name: Shadow Armament
Shadow Armament.description:
You can create a quasi-real simple or martial masterwork weapon appropriate for your current size. You are considered proficient with this weapon. The first time you hit a creature with this weapon, that creature can attempt a Will save to disbelieve; failure means the weapon deals damage normally, while success means the creature takes only 1 point of damage from the weapon’s attacks. The weapon deals only 1 point of damage to objects.

At 3rd level, and again at 11th level and 19th level, the weapon gains a cumulative +1 enhancement bonus.

At 7th level, the weapon gains either the frost or keen weapon special ability, chosen when the weapon is created. These abilities don’t function against a target that succeeds at its Will save.

At 15th level, the weapon deals minimum damage (as if it had rolled a 1 on each of its damage dice) against targets that succeed at their saves instead of 1 point of damage.

You can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to your oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1-minute increments. The weapon disappears after 1 round if it leaves your grasp.

Shadow Beast.name: Shadow Beast
Shadow Beast.description:
As a standard action, you can call forth one or more beasts made of shadow by expending 1 point of mental focus. This functions as shadow conjuration, but it can be used to duplicate only the effects of summon monster spells. Creatures created with this spell deal 50% of the normal damage to those that disbelieve the illusion, and their nondamaging effects have only a 50% chance of affecting disbelieving targets. This can be used to duplicate any summon monster spell up to @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{Summon Monster V}.

For every 2 additional levels you possess beyond 9th, the maximum spell level you can duplicate with this ability increases by 1 (to a maximum of @Compendium[pf1.spells.mi52crelhwuy6bmp]{Summon Monster IX} at 17th level). Regardless of the spell duplicated, the creatures remain for 1 round per occultist level you possess.

You must be at least 9th level to select this focus power.

Shadow Blend.name: Shadow Blend
Shadow Blend.description:
The mesmerist can trigger this trick whenever the subject attempts a Stealth check while in an area of dim or darker light. The subject gains total concealment from all enemies (50% miss chance) as long as it remains within areas of dim or darker light. Against creatures with darkvision, the subject gains concealment (20% miss chance) rather than total concealment.

Once triggered, this effect lasts for 1 round per mesmerist level or until the subject enters an area of normal or brighter light.

Shadow Blend (2 pts).name: Shadow Blend (2 pts)
Shadow Blend (2 pts).description:
In any condition of illumination other than bright light, the eidolon disappears into the shadows, giving it concealment (20% miss chance). If it has the shadow form evolution, it instead gains total concealment (50% miss chance).

The eidolon can suspend or resume this ability as a free action.

Shadow Blessing: Flicker of Shadows.name: Shadow Blessing: Flicker of Shadows
Shadow Blessing: Flicker of Shadows.description:
At 1st level, you can cause a weapon you touch to warp and become insubstantial for a split second before an attack. The first attack made with this weapon each round ignores any shield bonus to Armor Class, as well as bonuses from cover. Total cover still provides a creature its full benefit.

This effect lasts for 1 minute.

Shadow Blessing: Swift as Shadow.name: Shadow Blessing: Swift as Shadow
Shadow Blessing: Swift as Shadow.description: At 10th level, you can spend a swift action to empower yourself or an ally within 30 feet to move over the ground as easily as its shadow. The subject’s land speed increases by 10 feet and it takes no movement penalties for darkness, difficult terrain, or slickness. The creature can safely move over areas of ice and even those affected by a grease spell. When a creature affected by this ability hits with a charge attack, that attack deals an amount of additional cold damage equal to your level.

Shadow Bloodline.name: Lignage des Ombres
Shadow Bloodline.description:
Les esprits du plan des Ombres se promènent parfois dans le monde de la lumière. Des créatures de ce genre sont entrées en contact avec l’ancêtre de l’ensorceleur et ont instillé le mystère des créations d’ombre dans son lignage. L’ensorceleur est souvent maussade et détaché de la réalité. Il préfère rester en marge des cercles sociaux, seul, et se donner un air mystérieux et majestueux.

Compétence de classe : Discrétion

Sorts supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{Rayon affaiblissant} (niveau 3),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mz9yr5yhr0f3oqtp]{Vision dans le noir} (niveau 5),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{Ténèbres profondes} (nivea 7),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{Convocation d'ombres} (niveau 9),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{Magie des ombres} (niveau 11),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{Traversée des ombres} (niveau 13),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gado7zyg5knc83ir]{Mot de pouvoir aveuglant} (niveau 15),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.967ur7a9xepd704y]{Magie des ombres suprême} (niveau 17),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xxaycxbdsmalf5ov]{Reflets d'ombre} (niveau 19).

Dons supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{Arme en main},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.vWiTqHC4Y3Xn1Pme]{Attaque en finesse},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{Combat en aveugle},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{Discret},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Esquive},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{Incantation silencieuse},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Talent} (Discrétion),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.jCxcObXJfdDrx4WS]{Voltigeur}.

Arcane de lignage

Chaque fois que l’ensorceleur lance un sort du registre de l’obscurité ou de la branche des ombres, il gagne un bonus de circonstances égal au niveau du sort aux tests de Discrétion pendant 1d4 rounds.

Pouvoirs de lignage

L’héritage couleur de nuit que l’ensorceleur a reçu infuse dans sa magie la substance dont les ombres sont constituées.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.hj0rfw1zr2h69wjT]{Toucher des ombres},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 3 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.FoTYA3isXIFC9CyW]{Œil de la nuit},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 9 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.4SC9GKpJCxaJhmd4]{Puits d’ombre},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 15 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.NdpTtQ6CnnDiRtTO]{Enveloppe de ténèbres},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 20 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.dfwxdUdBeW1Fc4Xq]{Maître des ombres}.

Shadow Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Shadow Bloodrager Bloodline
Shadow Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
Because of your heritage, you can move and see through shadows as if you are part of them. Your fury absorbs light, warmth, and strength.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{Blind-Fight}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{Quick Draw}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Mz8ZG6nqW3NKFZhK]{Step Up}

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{Ray Of Enfeeblement} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mz9yr5yhr0f3oqtp]{Darkvision} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{Deeper Darkness} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{Shadow Conjuration} (16th)

Shadow Clone.name: Shadow Clone
Shadow Clone.description:
The ninja can create 1d4 shadowy duplicates of herself that conceal her true location. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.4jsss37x0pplib8f]{Mirror Image}, using the ninja's level as her caster level.

Using this ability is a standard action that uses up 1 ki point.

Shadow Discipline.name: Shadow Discipline
Shadow Discipline.description:
You perceive the space between light and darkness, and draw power from it. Shadows conceal and protect you, while revealing the locations of those who dare to hide within them. Over time, you develop the ability to deny the warmth of light or life to your enemies.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h4hrop7rq2c9phyi]{Blurred Movement} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.advqdmonj6ro62u7]{Fear The Sun} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{Deeper Darkness} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cmwcavfyc1vbehy8]{Shadow Step} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{Shadow Evocation} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{Shadow Walk} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8rf2ucrtzmxooyw6]{Lunar Veil} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h9dzj2fr5lksdjcp]{Umbral Strike} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight} (18th).

Shadow Door.name: Shadow Door
Shadow Door.description: At 16th level, you can take any part of your movement through shadows, teleporting to another location within 60 feet. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{Dimension Door}, except you can’t use shadow door in brightly lit areas. You can teleport in this manner a total of 10 feet per class level each day.

Shadow Duplicate.name: Shadow Duplicate
Shadow Duplicate.description: Once per day as an immediate action when the rogue is hit, the rogue can create a single shadow duplicate of herself, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.4jsss37x0pplib8f]{Mirror Image}. The GM randomly determines whether the attack hit the rogue or the shadow duplicate. The shadow duplicate lasts for a number of rounds equal to the rogue’s level, or until the shadow duplicate is dispelled or destroyed. This ability does not stack with the mirror image spell. The caster level for this ability is equal to the rogue’s level. A rogue can use this ability one additional time per day for every 5 rogue levels she has.

Shadow Final Revelation.name: Shadow Final Revelation
Shadow Final Revelation.description: Upon reaching 20th level, your body becomes permanently suffused with the essence of the Shadow Plane. You gain regeneration 5 while in dim light or darkness and immunity to cold, critical hits, and sneak attacks. Your regeneration is suppressed while in any level of illumination brighter than dim light. In addition, any spells you cast of the shadow subschool or with the darkness descriptor are automatically enlarged without affecting their spell level.

Shadow Form (2 pts).name: Shadow Form (2 pts)
Shadow Form (2 pts).description: The eidolon's body becomes shadowy and more indistinct. This shadow form grants the eidolon constant concealment (20% miss chance), and its melee attacks affect incorporeal creatures as if it had the ghost touch weapon property. The eidolon's melee attacks deal only half damage to corporeal creatures.

Shadow Master.name: Maître des ombres (L. Ombres)
Shadow Master.description:
Au niveau 20, l’ensorceleur peut parfaitement bien voir dans les ténèbres naturelles ou magiques. Lorsqu’il utilise @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{convocation d'ombres} ou @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{magie des ombres}, ses créations sont 20% plus réelles que la normale et toutes les créatures créées reçoivent les effets du don @Compendium[pf1.feats.7bJjKqNRrvpXJ4L3]{Amélioration des créatures convoquées}.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.MG4wDFbCBIx69iNW]{Lignage des Ombres}.

Shadow Mastery.name: Shadow Mastery
Shadow Mastery.description:
Whenever you cast an illusion spell from the shadow subschool, increase the strength of such spells by 1% per oracle level you have.

You must be at least 7th level to choose this revelation.

Shadow Mystery.name: Shadow Mystery
Shadow Mystery.description:
Class Skills: An oracle with this mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Knowledge (dungeoneering), and Stealth to her list of class skills.

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h4hrop7rq2c9phyi]{Blurred Movement} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{Invisibility} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{Deeper Darkness} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cmwcavfyc1vbehy8]{Shadow Step} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3idp5fjp62wpn4a4]{Vampiric Shadow Shield} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{Shadow Walk} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j2y1uga5fwg8deqq]{Invisibility, Mass} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.967ur7a9xepd704y]{Shadow Evocation, Greater} (16th),

Shadow Patron.name: Shadow Patron
Shadow Patron.description:
• 2nd — @Compendium[pf1.spells.kq916lznxo0ig68v]{Silent Image}
  • 4th — @Compendium[pf1.spells.tsndfcfijmgxs37p]{Darkness}

Shadow Projection.name: Shadow Projection
Shadow Projection.description:
You infuse your life force and psyche into your shadow, causing it to separate from your body and act as an independent creature. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.9u4mn2uxm862cpbb]{Shadow Projection} except as follows. Your shadow has the outsider type and the phantom subtype instead of the undead type. As a result, this ability does not have the evil descriptor and your shadow cannot be turned or affected as undead (though it can be affected as an outsider). You can use this ability for a number of hours per day equal to half your oracle level. These hours don’t need to be consecutive, but they must be spent in 1-hour increments. Your shadow’s hit points are not replenished between uses, although your shadow can be healed in the same manner as any other outsider. When this ability isn’t in use, any healing done to you also heals your shadow for an equal amount.

You must be at least 7th level to choose this revelation.

Shadow Splinter.name: Shadow Splinter
Shadow Splinter.description:
The mesmerist protects the subject against an attack and redirects the harm to someone else. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject takes damage from an attack. The damage the subject takes is reduced by an amount equal to 3 + the mesmerist’s Charisma modifier (to a maximum of the total amount of damage the attack deals). Another creature within range of the original attack, other than the attacker, is affected by a shadow illusion that makes it appear as if the attacker is attacking that creature instead of the attacker’s actual target. This second creature takes an amount of damage equal to the amount by which the attack’s damage was reduced. This shadow doesn’t require a roll to hit and ignores cover and concealment, but the target can attempt a Will save to disbelieve the effect. If it succeeds at this save, it neither takes the damage nor believes the attacker targeted it.

This trick can’t be triggered if there’s no eligible second creature within range to take the redirected damage. This is an illusion (shadow) effect.

Shadow Split.name: Shadow Split
Shadow Split.description:
This trick allows the ninja to create an illusory double of herself that moves away from her, allowing the ninja to create a distraction. When she uses this ability, an illusory double appears and moves away from the ninja, heading in one direction. The double climbs walls, jumps pits, or simply passes through obstacles, moving at twice the ninja's speed in the direction indicated by the ninja when the ability is used. Its course cannot be changed. The double persists for 1 round per level of the ninja. Those who interact with the double receive a Will saving throw to recognize that it is fake. The DC of this save is 10 + 1/2 the ninja's level + the ninja's Charisma modifier.

Each use of this ability uses up 1 ki point.

The ninja must possess the shadow clone ninja trick before selecting this trick.

Shadow Step.name: Pas dans l’ombre (É. Ill)
Shadow Step.description:
Au niveau 8, le magicien peut utiliser cette capacité pour voyager à travers le plan des Ombres et en ressortir par une action simple. Il peut ainsi voyager sur une distance maximale de 9 m (6 c) par niveau de magicien chaque jour, soit en une seule fois soit en plusieurs pas dans l’ombre correspondant à des multiples de 1,50 m (1 c). Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d’attaque d’opportunité. Le voyage à travers le plan des Ombres est plutôt imprécis. Lorsque le magicien ressort des ombres, il arrive à une case de distance de sa destination (le point d’arrivée précis est déterminé en utilisant les règles pour les armes à aspersion). Si la destination déterminée aléatoirement est occupée, le magicien est déplacé vers l’endroit sûr le plus proche. Lorsqu’il sort du plan des Ombres, le magicien est recouvert d’ombres qui lui donnent un camouflage similaire à celui du sort de @Compendium[pf1.spells.18kryvj2dfuymk9d]{flou} pendant 1 round. Le magicien peut emmener d’autres créatures volontaires avec lui mais le coût en terme de distance parcourue est multiplié par le nombre de personnes qui voyagent. Ces autres créatures réapparaissent elles aussi à une case d’écart de la destination choisie (lancer le dé pour chacune d’elles) et elles sont elles aussi recouvertes d’ombres.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.p9NfZDfgIe8APGCf]{Champ d'étude Ombres}.

Shadow Subdomain.name: Shadow Subdomain
Shadow Subdomain.description:
Replacement Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{Ray Of Enfeeblement}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{Phantasmal Killer}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.003tu19dpyoaj0se]{Orb Of The Void}

Shadow Subschool.name: Champ d'étude Ombres
Shadow Subschool.description:
École associée : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.xKyCz5YIEJFBQICl]{Illusion}

Pouvoirs d'école

Les illusionnistes se servent de la magie pour créer des images trompeuses, des chimères et des faux-semblants destinés à dérouter et à duper leurs ennemis.

  • Pouvoir passif : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.pDaXowPKX4scZL0E]{Illusions durables}
  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.IeX7of9cT8M7c0xy]{Ténèbres enchevêtrantes} (remplace Rayon aveuglant)
  • Pouvoir de niveau 8 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.hbttw8IQ2kKnpOnB]{Pas dans l’ombre} (remplace Champ d’invisibilité)

Shadow Vision.name: Shadow Vision
Shadow Vision.description:
While bloodraging, you gain low-light vision if you don’t already have it. If you already have low-light vision, you gain darkvision to a distance of 30 feet.

At 10th level, you gain darkvision with a range of 30 feet, or add 30 feet to the range of your darkvision if you already have it.

Shadow Warrior.name: Shadow Warrior
Shadow Warrior.description: At 20th level, you become shadow and fury personified. You see perfectly in natural and magical darkness. Whenever you deal hit point damage with a spell or attack, you also deal 2 points of Strength damage to each creature that took damage.

Shadow Well.name: Puits d’ombre (L. Ombres)
Shadow Well.description:
Au niveau 9, l’ensorceleur peut utiliser la capacité de Discrétion même si on l’observe ou qu’il ne bénéficie pas d’un abri ni d’un camouflage, pour autant qu’il se trouve à au plus 3 m (2 c) d’une ombre autre que la sienne. De plus, lorsqu’il se trouve dans une zone de ténèbres ou de lumière ténue, il peut choisir de changer de place avec un allié situé à au plus 18 m (12 c) par une action simple. L’allié lui aussi doit être dans une zone d’ombre ou de lumière ténue et il doit accepter de changer de place avec l’ensorceleur. Au niveau 13, au lieu de cela, l’ensorceleur peut faire changer de place deux alliés qui se trouvent à au plus 18 m (12 c) de lui. À l’exception des particularités notées ci-dessus, ce pouvoir fonctionne comme @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{porte dimensionnelle}. L’ensorceleur peut effectuer un changement de place par jour au niveau 9 et un de plus par jour aux niveaux 17 et 20.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.MG4wDFbCBIx69iNW]{Lignage des Ombres}.

Shadow's Chill.name: Shadow's Chill
Shadow's Chill.description: When a rogue with this talent hits a creature with a melee weapon that deals sneak attack damage, a number of points of the damage dealt equal to the number of sneak attack dice rolled is cold damage. The remainder of the sneak attack damage and the normal weapon damage are unaffected. The rogue must have cold resistance from a racial trait before selecting this talent.

Shadow's Sight.name: Vision des ombres
Shadow's Sight.description: Le justicier gagne une vision nocturne et une vision dans le noir de 18 mètres. S’il possédait déjà une vision dans le noir, sa portée est augmentée de 9 mètres.

Shadow's Speed.name: Vitesse des ombres
Shadow's Speed.description:
La vitesse de base du justicier augmente de 3 mètres.

Au niveau 10, elle augmente encore de 3 mètres.

Shadowbound Curse.name: Shadowbound Curse
Shadowbound Curse.description:
Your pigmentation is oddly colorless, and your eyes are highly sensitive to light. You are blinded for 1 round when exposed to normal or bright light and dazzled while in such a lit area. You gain darkvision to a range of 30 feet.

At 5th level, the range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet.

At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{Shadow Conjuration} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known and @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{Shadow Evocation} to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known.

At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{Shadow Walk} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.

Shadowstrike.name: Toucher des ombres (L. Ombres)
Shadowstrike.description:
Au niveau 1, l’ensorceleur peut utiliser une action simple et effectuer une attaque de contact au corps à corps pour infliger 1d4 points de dégâts non létaux + 1 par tranche de deux niveaux d’ensorceleur. La cible est également éblouie pendant 1 minute. Les créatures bénéficiant d’une vision nocturne ou d’une vision dans le noir ne sont pas éblouies par cette capacité. L’ensorceleur peut utiliser le toucher des ombres un nombre de fois par jour égal à 3 + son modificateur de Charisme.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.MG4wDFbCBIx69iNW]{Lignage des Ombres}.

Shaitan Bloodline.name: Lignage Shaitan
Shaitan Bloodline.description:
Le personnage est né du pouvoir des génies de la terre et il est fortement imprégné de leur magie.

Compétence de classe : Connaissances (plans)

Sorts supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xco22162bwgxn7pj]{Coup au but} (niveau 3),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ec2zmvdzi4m3puh4]{Poussière scintillante} (niveau 5),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zq7xi7l5vgpqu7rt]{Arme magique suprême} (niveau 7),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{peau de pierre} (niveau 9),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l83djt5019ujasjh]{mur de pierre} (niveau 11),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fnxgq54y02f6ri82]{mur de fer} (niveau 13),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{changement de plan} (niveau 15),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{Corps de fer} (niveau 17),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{souhait} (niveau 19).

Dons supplémentaires :

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.vWiTqHC4Y3Xn1Pme]{Attaque en finesse},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Attaque en puissance},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Esquive},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{Extension d'effet},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Réflexes surhumains},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Science de l'initiative},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Talent} (Connaissances [plans]),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Vigueur surhumaine}.

Arcane de lignage

Quand le personnage lance un sort qui inflige des dégâts d’énergie, il peut changer le type de dégâts pour en faire de l’acide. Ceci change également le registre du sort qui s’accorde alors au nouveau type d’énergie.

Pouvoirs de lignage

Comme le shaitan, le personnage possède des pouvoirs naturels sur la terre ainsi que quelques pouvoirs liés à son ancêtre.

  • Pouvoir de niveau 1 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.NpZbdMOBzmmIFRNx]{Rayon acide},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 3 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.MHluImPeE22nF5VE]{Résistance élémentaire},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 9 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Z46SuTJxwcXPmQi8]{Avalanche},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 15 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.q3hwveEbUcLrNz73]{Mouvements élémentaires},
  • Pouvoir de niveau 20 : @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.S5qTE935Zpa2ZZuh]{Pouvoir du shaitan}.

Shape Emotions.name: Façonnage des émotions (É. Enc)
Shape Emotions.description:
Au niveau 8, le magicien peut émettre une aura de 9 m (6 c) qui va faciliter ou empêcher les influences émotionnelles pendant un nombre de rounds par jour égal à son niveau de magicien (ces rounds ne doivent pas forcément être consécutifs). Si le magicien choisit d’empêcher les influences émotionnelles, lui et ses alliés situés dans l’aura reçoivent un bonus de moral de +4 aux jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et les effets mentaux et tous les effets de terreur qui ciblent l’un d’entre eux sont réduits d’une catégorie (« secoué » est annulé, « effrayé » devient « secoué » et « paniqué » devient « effrayé »). Si le magicien choisit de faciliter les influences émotionnelles, les ennemis situés dans l’aura reçoivent un malus de –2 aux jets de sauvegarde contre les sorts et effets mentaux.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.j4QEAgodP37MOFd6]{Champ d'étude Manipulation}.

Shape Mastery.name: Shape Mastery
Shape Mastery.description: As part of casting an evocation spell with an area of effect, you can expend a number of points of mental focus up to your Intelligence modifier to exclude an equal number of squares from the area.

Shape Wood.name: Shape Wood
Shape Wood.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0

You reshape wood to suit your purposes, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.10e3iwsr5jkq4q73]{Wood Shape}.

Shapechanger Bloodline.name: Shapechanger Bloodline
Shapechanger Bloodline.description:
Channeling the power of your shapeshifting ancestors that you carry in your blood, you gain powers that allow you to change your shape and alter your appearance and physical abilities.

Class Skill: Disguise.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{Disguise Self} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{Alter Self} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{Fly} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{Beast Shape II} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d40ia71c2eljm91k]{Polymorph} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{Transformation} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t44p3oeq43jwcgwg]{Polymorph, Greater} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ukacuu0cvdjkqxwu]{Frightful Aspect} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{Shapechange} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{Combat Casting},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{Extend Spell},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Disguise),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Toughness}.

Bloodline Arcana: You are very skilled with magic that transforms you. Transmutation spells you cast only on yourself affect you as though your caster level were 1 higher.

Shapechanger Bloodrager Bloodline.name: Shapechanger Bloodrager Bloodline
Shapechanger Bloodrager Bloodline.description:
The blood of doppelgangers, faceless stalkers, lycanthropes, or other shapechangers courses through your veins.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BkKYCzEGNTzZRiTz]{Fleet}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{Improved Unarmed Strike}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Power Attack}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{Weapon Focus}

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{Enlarge Person} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{Alter Self} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{Fly} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{Stoneskin} (16th)

Shapeshift.name: Métamorphose
Shapeshift.description:
Chaque jour, le chaman peut se transformer en une autre créature, comme avec @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{modification d’apparence}, pendant un nombre de minutes égal à son niveau. La durée de la transformation n’est pas forcément consécutive mais doit être utilisée par fragment d’une minute au minimum. Le changement de forme (y compris pour reprendre son apparence normale) est une action simple qui ne provoque pas d’attaques d’opportunité.

Au niveau 8, ce pouvoir fonctionne comme @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjdfluulncmqacc3]{forme bestiale I}.

Au niveau 12, il fonctionne comme @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{forme bestiale II}.

Au niveau 16 comme @Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{forme bestiale III}.

Au niveau 20 comme @Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{forme bestiale IV}.

Shard Explosion.name: Shard Explosion
Shard Explosion.description:
As a swift action, you can cause jagged pieces of stone to explode outward from your body. These shards deal 1d6 points of piercing damage per two oracle levels (minimum 1d6) to all creatures within a 10-foot burst. A Reflex save halves this damage. In addition, the broken shards make the area difficult terrain until your next turn.

You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every five levels thereafter.

Shard Soul.name: Éclats d’âme
Shard Soul.description:
Le chaman gagne une RD 3/magie. Cette RD augmente de 1 par tranche de quatre niveaux de chaman après le huitième. De plus, par une action simple, le chaman peut faire jaillir des esquilles osseuses de son corps dans un rayonnement de 3 mètres de rayon (2 c). Elles infligent [[/r 1d6]] points de dégâts perforants par tranche de deux niveaux de chaman. Un jet de Réflexes réussi permet de réduire ces dégâts de moitié.

Le chaman peut utiliser ce pouvoir trois fois par jour mais il doit attendre au moins [[/r 1d4]] rounds entre deux utilisations.

Share Essence.name: Partage d’essence (É. Néc)
Share Essence.description:
Par une action simple, le magicien peut choisir de partager son énergie vitale avec une créature vivante qu’il touche. Il subit 1d6 points de dégâts non létaux + 1 point par tranche de deux niveaux de magicien. Cette quantité ne peut toutefois jamais égaler ni dépasser le nombre de points de vie qu’il lui reste (les points de dégât excédentaires sont annulés). Le bénéficiaire du sort gagne un nombre de points de vie temporaires égal à la quantité de dégâts que le magicien a effectivement subis. Ces points de vie temporaires persistent pendant 1 heure. Le magicien ne peut pas utiliser cette capacité pour s’octroyer des points de vie temporaires à lui-même. Il peut l’utiliser un nombre de fois par jour égal à 3 + son modificateur d’Intelligence. Cette capacité n’a aucun effet si le magicien est immunisé aux dégâts non létaux.

Retour au @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.hN7nfIgDvGMd2MZf]{Champ d'étude Vie}.

Share Knowledge.name: Partage des connaissances
Share Knowledge.description:
Le chaman vise un unique allié consentant situé dans un rayon de 9 mètres (6 c) et partage ses connaissances et ses expériences avec lui pendant un nombre de minutes égal à son modificateur de Charisme. Pendant cette période, le sujet connaît toutes les langues que maîtrise le chaman et utilise le modificateur de compétence du chaman au lieu du sien sur tous les tests de Connaissances.

Une créature affectée par ce maléfice ne peut plus en être la cible pendant 24 heures.

Share Memory.name: Share Memory
Share Memory.description: At 5th level, you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.9hi94t05i449j5ul]{Share Memory} at will, but only with a willing target.

Share Spells (SU).name: Share Spells (SU)
Share Spells (SU).description: The spiritualist can cast a spell with a target of “you” on her phantom (as a spell with a range of touch) instead of on herself. A spiritualist can cast spells from the spiritualist spell list on her phantom even if the spells normally do not affect creatures of the phantom’s type (outsider). This ability does not allow the phantom to share abilities that aren’t spells, even if they function like spells.

Share the Danger.name: Share the Danger
Share the Danger.description: At 15th level, an order of the eel cavalier can form a pact to share danger with an ally. As a full-round action, the cavalier enters into this pact with a willing creature that has an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. The cavalier and his partner each gain a deflection bonus to AC equal to the cavalier’s Charisma modifier (minimum +1). A partner that takes damage from attacks and effects that deal hit point damage (including from special abilities) takes only half damage, and the other half of the damage is dealt to the other partner in the pact. Forms of harm that do not involve hit points, such as charm effects, ability score damage and drain, negative levels, and death effects, are not affected. If either partner in the pact suffers a reduction of hit points from a lowered Constitution score, the reduction is not split, as it is not hit point damage. This effect ends if the cavalier makes a new pact (at which point the existing pact immediately ends), if the partners in the pact move more than 1,000 feet apart, or if either partner in the pact takes a swift action to dissolve the partnership. Damage already divided is not reassigned when the pact ends.

Shared Consciousness.name: Shared Consciousness
Shared Consciousness.description:
At 1st level, while a phantom is confined in a spiritualist’s consciousness (but not while it’s fully manifested or banished to the Ethereal Plane), it grants the spiritualist the Skill Focus feat in two skills determined by the phantom’s emotional focus, unless the spiritualist already has Skill Focus in those skills.

It also grants a +4 bonus on saving throws against all mind-affecting effects; at 12th level, this bonus increases to +8.

Lastly, once per day, when the spiritualist fails a saving throw against a mind-affecting effect, as an immediate action she can shunt that effect into the phantom’s section of her consciousness instead. When she does so, she is not affected by the mind-affecting effect, but for the normal duration of that effect, the spiritualist loses the bonuses on saving throws against mind-affecting effects and the Skill Focus effects granted by her phantom, and can’t use this ability to shunt a mind-affecting effect into the phantom’s consciousness or manifest her phantom in any way.

When a mind-affecting effect is shunted into the phantom’s consciousness, spells such as dispel magic and break enchantment can be cast on the spiritualist to end the effect’s duration as if the spiritualist were affected by the mind-affecting effect.

Shared Evolution (1 pt).name: Shared Evolution (1 pt)
Shared Evolution (1 pt).description:
Select a 1-point or 2-point evolution the eidolon has. As a standard action, the eidolon can touch the summoner and transfer the selected evolution to him. This functions as the summoner’s aspect ability, and the same limitations apply. The summoner can touch the eidolon as a standard action to return the evolution. The evolution returns to the eidolon automatically if the eidolon is dismissed by the summoner or sent back to its home plane.

This evolution can only be taken by Summoners with the Twinned Summoner archetype.

Shared Evolution (UC) (1 pt).name: Shared Evolution (UC) (1 pt)
Shared Evolution (UC) (1 pt).description:
Requirements: Twinned eidolon.

Select a 1-point or 2-point evolution the eidolon has. As a standard action, the eidolon can touch the summoner and transfer the selected evolution to him. This functions as the summoner’s aspect ability, and the same limitations apply. The summoner can touch the eidolon as a standard action to return the evolution. The evolution returns to the eidolon automatically if the eidolon is dismissed by the summoner or sent back to its home plane.

Shared Seance.name: Shared Seance
Shared Seance.description: At 2nd level, a medium can share his channeled spirit’s aid with his allies. All allies who participate in the medium’s seance gain the channeled spirit’s seance boon for 24 hours.

Shared Skill.name: Shared Skill
Shared Skill.description: At 13th level, each time you set up an emotional bond, you can choose one Intelligence- or Charisma-based skill from the list of psychic’s class skills. Any subject of your bond can use your bonus instead of his own when attempting checks with that skill as long as the bond lasts.

Shared Slot (2 pts).name: Shared Slot (2 pts)
Shared Slot (2 pts).description:
Select a magic item slot. A magic item worn by the eidolon in that slot remains active even if the summoner is also wearing a magic item in that slot.

This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new slot. 

This evolution can only be taken by Summoners with the Twinned Summoner archetype.

Shared Slot (UC) (2 pts).name: Shared Slot (UC) (2 pts)
Shared Slot (UC) (2 pts).description:
Requirements: Twinned eidolon.

Select a magic item slot. A magic item worn by the eidolon in that slot remains active even if the summoner is also wearing a magic item in that slot.

This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new slot.

Sharpened Accuracy.name: Précision affinée (Rage)
Sharpened Accuracy.description:
